1a1('bum): @#/ /'bum ga pa bzhugs so//
1b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga gnyis
1b2('bum): pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de
1b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
1b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skyed mched drug nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
2a1('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
2a2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
2a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
2a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
2a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
2b1('bum): med par/ skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
2b2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
2b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
2b4('bum): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
2b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye
2b6('bum): mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
3a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
3a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
3a3('bum): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
3a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched
3a5('bum): drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
3a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
3b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
3b2('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched
3b3('bum): drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
3b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
3b5('bum): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
3b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dor ba med pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang
3b7('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye
4a1('bum): mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
4a2('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
4a3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
4a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
4a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
4a6('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
4a7('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dngos po med pa
4b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
4b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa
4b3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
4b4('bum): par| skye mched drug dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
4b5('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
4b6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
4b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
5a1('bum): gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
5a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
5a3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa stong pa nyid
5a4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
5a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po
5a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
5a7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
5b1('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
5b2('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
5b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
5b4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa mtha'
5b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
5b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
5b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
6a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa
6a2('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
6a3('bum): par/ reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
6a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
6a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
6a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
6a7('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
6b1('bum): reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
6b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po
6b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
6b4('bum): med par/ reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
6b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
6b6('bum): gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab
6b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
7a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
7a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
7a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
7a4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
7a5('bum): med par/ tshor pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
7a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
7a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
7b1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
7b2('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
7b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
7b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
7b5('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
7b6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
7b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog
8a1('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
8a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
8a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa
8a4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
8a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
8a6('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba rang
8a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
8b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs
8b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
8b3('bum): tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
8b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa
8b5('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
8b6('bum): tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
8b7('bum): do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
9a1('bum): par/ sred pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /
9a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
9a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
9a4('bum): par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
9a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
9a6('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred
9a7('bum): pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
9b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
9b2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa 'dus
9b3('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
9b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
9b5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa mtha'
9b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
9b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma
10a1('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
10a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
10a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya
10a4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
10a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong
10a6('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
10a7('bum): bya ba med par/ sred pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
10b1('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
10b2('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
10b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
10b4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar med par/ sred pa ngo bo nyid stong pa
10b5('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
10b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i
10b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang de dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
11a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
11a2('bum): tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
11a3('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ len pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
11a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
11a5('bum): tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
11a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
11a7('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
11b1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
11b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
11b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya
11b4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
11b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
11b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa mtha' las
11b7('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
12a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
12a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
12a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong
12a4('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
12a5('bum): par/ len pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
12a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
12a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
12b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
12b2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa mi dmigs pa stong
12b3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
12b4('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dngos po med pa steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
12b5('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
12b6('bum): len pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
12b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs
13a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
13a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
13a3('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
13a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
13a5('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
13a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
13a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa stong pa nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
13b1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
13b2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
13b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
13b4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya
13b5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
13b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
13b7('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
14a1('bum): srid pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
14a2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa thog ma dang tha ma
14a3('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
14a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
14a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
14a6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa rang bzhin stong pa zhas bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
14a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa chos thams cad
14b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
14b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan
14b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
14b4('bum): bya ba med par/ srid pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
14b5('bum): byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
14b6('bum): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
14b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
15a1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
15a2('bum): srid pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
15a3('bum): sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
15a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
15a5('bum): do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
15a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
15a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
15b1('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
15b2('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
15b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
15b4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba don dam pa stong pa zhes
15b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
15b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
15b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba 'dus
16a1('bum): ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
16a2('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya
16a3('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
16a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
16a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
16a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
16a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba rang bzhin stong pa
16b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
16b2('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid
16b3('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
16b4('bum): skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
16b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
16b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
16b7('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
17a1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye
17a2('bum): ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol
17a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
17a4('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
17a5('bum): chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
17a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sped pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
17a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phye stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
17b1('bum): su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
17b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang do stang pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
17b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
17b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid
17b5('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
17b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
17b7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus byas stong pa
18a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
18a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pha la sbyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
18a3('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
18a4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
18a5('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga
18a6('bum): shi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
18a7('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya
18b1('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
18b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
18b3('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chos
18b4('bum): thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
18b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
18b6('bum): gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
18b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byad de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
19a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos
19a2('bum): po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong la nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
19a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
19a4('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
19a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
19a6('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
19a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs
19b1('bum): la/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
19b2('bum): par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang dmigs la/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
19b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu
19b4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
19b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dbang po rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang dmigs la/ dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes
19b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ stobs rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag
19b7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
20a1('bum): med par/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang dmigs la/ byang chub kyi yan
20a2('bum): lag de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags
20a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de
20a4('bum): dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i bden
20a5('bum): pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha
20a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ bsam gtan rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de
20a7('bum): dag kyang dmigs la/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
20b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ tshad med pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ tshad med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab
20b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i
20b3('bum): tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
20b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de dag kyang
20b5('bum): dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
20b6('bum): par/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mthar gyis gnas
20b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
21a1('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
21a2('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
21a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
21a4('bum): mngon par shes pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
21a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang dmigs la/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom
21a6('bum): sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom ste/
21a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
21b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang
21b2('bum): dmigs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
21b3('bum): la bya ba med par/ mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mi 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi
21b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang
21b5('bum): dag par rig pa da dag kyang dmigs la/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
21b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snying rje chen po bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de'ang dmigs la/ snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de
21b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul
22a1('bum): gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// //
22a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga gsum pa/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de
22a3('bum): ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub
22a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur te/
22a5('bum): sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs po ni/
22a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /
22a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byad pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o//
22b1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin
22b2('bum): gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyi/ 'di la bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan
22b3('bum): par mi bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes
22b4('bum): zer ba ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
22b5('bum): po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
22b6('bum): las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci
22b7('bum): zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
23a1('bum): bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes
23a2('bum): pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas
23a3('bum): kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs
23a4('bum): su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang /
23a5('bum): gtan la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to/ /'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di
23a6('bum): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing /
23a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod la ni/ byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin/
23b1('bum): /khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang
23b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub
23b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'du shes
23b4('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba
23b5('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid ni bdag gam bdag
23b6('bum): gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sgra ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ro ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /reg ni
23b7('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag
24a1('bum): gis stong ngo / /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus kyi rnam par shes
24a2('bum): pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te
24a3('bum): reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg
24a4('bum): pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna
24a5('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
24a6('bum): gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag
24a7('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rlung
24b1('bum): gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ma rig pa ni bdag
24b2('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ming dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /skye mched
24b3('bum): drug ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /len pa ni bdag
24b4('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / /srid pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni
24b5('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /brtson 'grus kyi pha
24b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
24b7('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni
25a1('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'dus byas
25a2('bum): stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /thog ma
25a3('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /chos
25a4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rang gi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mi dmigs pa stong nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /
25a5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong
25a6('bum): ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis
25a7('bum): stong ngo / /dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'phags
25b1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /
25b2('bum): tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag
25b3('bum): gis stong ngo / /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni
25b4('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam
25b5('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /so so yang dag par rig pa
25b6('bum): rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /de ltar bdag
25b7('bum): gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ de'ang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/
26a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du
26a2('bum): byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu/ shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
26a3('bum): nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'ang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub
26a4('bum): phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
26a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med/ nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /
26a6('bum): zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang
26a7('bum): bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
26b1('bum): ba las zlog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
26b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
26b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las bzlog ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
26b4('bum): la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan
26b5('bum): lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad med pa
26b6('bum): rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
26b7('bum): sbyor ba dang / /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyi sa
27a1('bum): mngon du gyis shig / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa
27a2('bum): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig pa'i bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing /
27a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/ khyod la ci zhig
27a4('bum): bya/ de'i don du ni bskal ba grangs med tshad med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
27a5('bum): bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
27a6('bum): mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig / ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
27a7('bum): pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung
27b1('bum): du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya
27b2('bum): ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba
27b3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
27b4('bum): ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar
27b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
27b6('bum): smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul
27b7('bum): gyis ston pa dang / 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya
28a1('bum): ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar
28a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces
28a3('bum): bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug
28a4('bum): bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya
28a5('bum): ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi
28a6('bum): zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs
28a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sna mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
28b1('bum): ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lte mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya
28b2('bum): ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes
28b3('bum): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lus mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma
28b4('bum): med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
28b5('bum): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
28b6('bum): dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang /
28b7('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sgra mi rtag ces bya ba dang /
29a1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
29a2('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dri mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba
29a3('bum): dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i
29a4('bum): tshul gyis ston pa dang / ro mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
29a5('bum): smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / reg mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
29a6('bum): dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
29a7('bum): dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes
29b1('bum): bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par
29b2('bum): shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
29b3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med
29b4('bum): ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs
29b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma
29b6('bum): med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces
29b7('bum): bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par
30a1('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya
30a2('bum): ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
30a3('bum): zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
