76a5('bum): 'byor/ mngon par shes pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med
76a6('bum): pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas
76a7('bum): med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag pa med pa la
76b1('bum): gnas med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /ting nge
76b2('bum): 'dzin rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
76b3('bum): 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med
76b4('bum): pa la gnas med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
76b5('bum): rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med
76b6('bum): pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
76b7('bum): 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /
77a1('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /mi
77a2('bum): 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /
77a3('bum): rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
77a4('bum): rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /so so
77a5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ byams pa chen po skye ba med
77a6('bum): pa la gnas med do/ /byams pa chen po 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /byams pa chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med
77a7('bum): do/ /byams pa chen po mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /byams pa chen po 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa la gnas
77b1('bum): med do/ /rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med
77b2('bum): pa la gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /
77b3('bum): rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
77b4('bum): 'dres pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs
77b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'byung ba med pa la gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs
77b6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'du shes shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med
77b7('bum): do/ /'du byed shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
78a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig shin tu
78a2('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rna ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sna shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lce shin tu rnam par
78a3('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lus shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
78a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs shin
78a5('bum): tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sgra shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dri shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /ro shin tu rnam
78a6('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /reg shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /chos shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/
78a7('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
78b1('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa shin tu
78b2('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
78b3('bum): gnas med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
78b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rna ba'i
78b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par
78b6('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
78b7('bum): gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/
79a1('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
79a2('bum): tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
79a3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yid
79a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
79a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /chu'i khams
79a6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /me'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rlung gi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
79a7('bum): gnas med do/ /nam mkha'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab
79b1('bum): 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ma
79b2('bum): rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'du byed shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
79b3('bum): med do/ /ming dang gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /skye mched drug shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa
79b4('bum): la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sred pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /len pa shin tu rnam par dag
79b5('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /srid pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /skye ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rga shi shin tu rnam par dag
79b6('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
79b7('bum): med do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga drug pa/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag
80a1('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam
80a2('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam
80a3('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
80a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par
80a5('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
80a6('bum): med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /don dam
80a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'dus ma byas stong
80b1('bum): bo nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
80b2('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la
80b3('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
80b4('bum): gnas med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /ngo
80b5('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de
80b6('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dran pa
80b7('bum): nye bar bzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /yang dag par spong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shin tu rnam
81a1('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /dbang po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /
81a2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/
81a3('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phags
81a4('bum): pa'i bden pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /bsam gtan shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /tshad med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
81a5('bum): ma'i gnas med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rnam par thar pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med
81a6('bum): do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
81a7('bum): pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /mngon par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /ting nge 'dzin shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
81b1('bum): ma'i gnas med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
81b2('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /mi 'jigs
81b3('bum): pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /snying rje chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa la
81b4('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
81b5('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir/ bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
81b6('bum): ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
81b7('bum): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sems can med pa'i phyir/ sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
82a1('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ srog med pa'i phyir/
82a2('bum): srog shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
82a3('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gso ba med pa'i phyir/ gso ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
82a4('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu
82a5('bum): med pa'i phyir/ skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
82a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang zag med pa'i phyir/ gang zag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i
82a7('bum): gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /
82b1('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shed can med pa'i phyir/ shed can shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
82b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shed bdag med pa'i phyir/ shed bdag shin tu rnam
82b3('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
82b4('bum): gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byed pa po med pa'i phyir/ byed pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
82b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshor ba po med pa'i phyir/
82b6('bum): tshor ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
82b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shes pa po med pa'i phyir/ shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab
83a1('bum): 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/
83a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mthong pa po med pa'i phyir/ mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
83a3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i
83a4('bum): gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/
83a5('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/ /'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
83a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
83a7('bum): rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
83b1('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas
83b2('bum): med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
83b3('bum): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la/ shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
83b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
83b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
83b6('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la
83b7('bum): rnam par ma grol pa'i ye shes gzigs pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
84a1('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
84a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi
84a3('bum): 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
84a4('bum): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
84a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
84a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mtshe ma'i lha
84a7('bum): rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
84b1('bum): don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
84b2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub
84b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
84b4('bum): lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
84b5('bum): do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
84b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
84b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa kun
85a1('bum): 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
85a2('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
85a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab
85a4('bum): 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
85a5('bum): dper na/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
85a6('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
85a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od
85b1('bum): la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
85b2('bum): lta ste/ dper na/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
85b3('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
85b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/
85b5('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge rgyas
85b6('bum): kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
85b7('bum): gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
86a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/
86a2('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
86a3('bum): tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od lag nas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
86a4('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
86a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
86a6('bum): rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
86a7('bum): med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du
86b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub gang
86b2('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ gzugs
86b3('bum): med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
86b4('bum): kyi med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad ni
86b5('bum): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
86b6('bum): pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du bstan pa dang /
86b7('bum): lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang
87a1('bum): bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
87a2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos kyang / chos de dag thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba'ang chos thams
87a3('bum): cad po de dag nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge
87a4('bum): ba zhes bya ba ni/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi
87a5('bum): las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos pa dang / dge ba
87a6('bum): bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten ba'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang /
87a7('bum): rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam
87b1('bum): par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten
87b2('bum): pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /
87b3('bum): lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i
87b4('bum): chos dge ba zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/
87b5('bum): 'di ltar/ rab 'byor/ srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ ma byin par len pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'dod pas log
87b6('bum): par g.yem pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ brdzun du smra ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ phra ma ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab
87b7('bum): 'byor/ zhe gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ tshig kyal pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ chags sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi
88a1('bum): dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ gnod sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ log par lta ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /khro ba dang / mdud par
88a2('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /
88a3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung du ma
88a4('bum): bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /
88a5('bum): gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /khams rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched rnams ni lung du ma bstan pa'o/ /
88a6('bum): rnam par smin pa thams cad ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/
88a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / dge ba bcu'i las
88b1('bum): kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs
88b2('bum): par de ma yin pa/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom
88b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
88b4('bum): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan
88b5('bum): ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang / mi shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang
88b6('bum): po dang / rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig
88b7('bum): pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong
89a1('bum): ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug par
89a2('bum): mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes kyang yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /
89a3('bum): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam
89a4('bum): pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
89a5('bum): ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
89a6('bum): te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar
89a7('bum): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba
89b1('bum): 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/
89b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan
89b3('bum): dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam
89b4('bum): par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran
89b5('bum): pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o/ /
89b6('bum): zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde
89b7('bum): ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams
90a1('bum): cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha'
90a2('bum): mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
90a3('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
90a4('bum): te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes
90a5('bum): med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang
90a6('bum): tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
90a7('bum): pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
90b1('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dong ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
90b2('bum): nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
90b3('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las
90b4('bum): 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos
90b5('bum): zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
90b6('bum): bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
90b7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
91a1('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
91a2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
91a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
91a4('bum): bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
91a5('bum): 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs
91a6('bum): pa'i chos rnams dang / dran pa nya bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
91a7('bum): lag bdun dang / /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
91b1('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
91b2('bum): lnga dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
91b3('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol
91b4('bum): ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med
91b5('bum): pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/
91b6('bum): chos nyid/ chos kyi dbyings/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/
91b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
92a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/
92a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ thun mong ma lags pa'i chos zhes bya ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag
92a3('bum): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
92a4('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
92a5('bum): smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
92a6('bum): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems
92a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o/ /chos thams
92b1('bum): cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
92b2('bum): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan
92b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
92b4('bum): ldan 'das/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/
92b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
92b6('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
92b7('bum): dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub
93a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
93a2('bum): rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor
93a3('bum): ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams
93a4('bum): cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /de ltar sems can thams cad yongs
93a5('bum): su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o/ /bdag gis
93a6('bum): ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa
93a7('bum): la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du
93b1('bum): sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
93b2('bum): gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba
93b3('bum): pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor pa nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad
93b4('bum): sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par
93b5('bum): bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya
93b6('bum): ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang / bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sems can
93b7('bum): thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ /sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar
94a1('bum): bya'o/ /de nas gzod pa dag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag
94a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa
94a3('bum): rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
94a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ /
94a5('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems
94a6('bum): mi skyed/ gtso ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ /des
94a7('bum): sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems
94b1('bum): dang ldan par byas te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di
94b2('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
94b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems
94b4('bum): can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang
94b5('bum): bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag
94b6('bum): tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la mos par bya'o/ /chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer
94b7('bum): med pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la
95a1('bum): dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba sta/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa
95a2('bum): zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
95a3('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
95a4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong
95a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las
95a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
95a7('bum): la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gnyid la gnas/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med
95b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
95b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams
95b3('bum): la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad med
95b4('bum): pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ba rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar ba rnams la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par
95b5('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin
95b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi
95b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
96a1('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng+ge rnam par brtse
96a2('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
96a3('bum): chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam bar lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal
96a4('bum): gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rgyal bo ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin
96a5('bum): la gnas/ 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dpung rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i tshig
96a6('bum): la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyogs su rnam par blta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyag
96a7('bum): rgya yongs su 'dzin pha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha'
96b1('bum): rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dbang bo'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la
96b2('bum): gnas/ rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam
96b3('bum): par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas la brten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dri ma med pa'i
96b4('bum): sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
96b5('bum): gnas/ 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad mi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mi 'pham
96b6('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'jig pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
96b7('bum): la gnas/ nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
97a1('bum): snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems
97a2('bum): gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i
97a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par
97a4('bum): 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge
97a5('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge
97a6('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ g.yo ba med pa'i ting nge
97a7('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ yul las rgal pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
97b1('bum): dge ba'i ma tog rgyas shing bsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mi mnyam pa dang
97b2('bum): mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge
97b3('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa gcig
97b4('bum): tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa 'dor ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i
97b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mngon
97b6('bum): par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa'i
97b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin pa la gnas/ gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i
98a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa'i ting nge
98a2('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma med ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi 'od kyi
98a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdul
98a4('bum): med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams
98a5('bum): cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems
98a6('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/
98a7('bum): nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sems can gyi phul po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur
98b1('bum): bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed
98b2('bum): pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga bdun pa/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i
98b3('bum): bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom
98b4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ don gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig /shA radwa ta'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
98b5('bum): bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang /
98b6('bum): gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyes bur lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / shed can tu lta ba rab tu spang bo dang / shed bdag tu lta ba rab tu sbang ba dang / byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed
98b7('bum): du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du 'jug pa por
99a1('bum): lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu
99a2('bum): spang ba dang / yod par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang
99a3('bum): ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba
99a4('bum): dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang
99a5('bum): ba dang / stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden
99a6('bum): par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshad med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /
99a7('bum): rnam par thar bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
99b1('bum): smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
99b2('bum): pa'i stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mi 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying
99b3('bum): rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
99b4('bum): bya ba lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos kyi
99b5('bum): 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
99b6('bum): bgyid de/ /de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
99b7('bum): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
100a1('bum): 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
100a2('bum): lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
100a3('bum): ror lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba
100a4('bum): yin/ sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes par
100a5('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus
100a6('bum): te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar
100a7('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
100b1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sa'i khams
100b2('bum): su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ me'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nam mkha'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
100b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ming dang gzugs su lta
100b4('bum): bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye mched drug du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sred par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ len par lta bar 'gyur ba
100b5('bum): yin/ srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par
100b6('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba
100b7('bum): yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
101a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa
101a2('bum): nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar
101a3('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang gi mtshan
101a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar
101a5('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu
101a6('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam
101a7('bum): yan lag brgyad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshad med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs
101b1('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
101b2('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba
101b3('bum): yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur ba
101b4('bum): yin/ snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
101b5('bum): dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dge 'dun du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos kyi
101b6('bum): 'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
101b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
102a1('bum): ba skyed do/ /'du shes su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes par
102a2('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /snar
102a3('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid
102a4('bum): du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
102a5('bum): do/ /drir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ror dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /reg tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
102a6('bum): do/ /chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes par
102a7('bum): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs
102b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
102b2('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs
102b3('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
102b4('bum): lta ba skyed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
102b5('bum): do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
102b6('bum): ba skyed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
102b7('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
103a1('bum): chu'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rlung gi khams su dmigs
103a2('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /nam mkha'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
103a3('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ma rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes par dmigs
103a4('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ming dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye mched drug tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
103a5('bum): skyed do/ /reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sred par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
103a6('bum): ba skyed do/ /len par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
103a7('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rga shir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshul khrims kyi
103b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
103b2('bum): par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs
103b3('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /phyi nang
103b4('bum): stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs
103b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed

103b7('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rang bzhin
104a1('bum): stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /

104a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
104a4('bum): pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yang dag par spong bar dmigs
104a5('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dbang por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
104a6('bum): skyed do/ /stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan
104a7('bum): lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bsam gtan du dmigs
104b1('bum): shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshad med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
104b2('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
104b3('bum): ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mngon par shes par dmigs shing
104b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzungs kyi sgor dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /de
