104b6('bum): par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byams pa chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /snying rje chen por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
104b7('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
105a1('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byang chub tu dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
105a2('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dge 'dun du dmigs shing
105a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i
105a4('bum): tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta ba dang / 'du shes su lta ba dang /
105a5('bum): 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta ba dang / snar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang / lus su lta ba dang / yid
105a6('bum): du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta ba dang / drir lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta par 'gyur ba yin/ de'i
105a7('bum): phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam
105b1('bum): par shes par lta ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te
105b2('bum): reg par lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
105b3('bum): tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyan gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta
105b4('bum): ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i
105b5('bum): khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir ma rig
105b6('bum): par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs su lta ba dang / skye mched drug tu lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar
105b7('bum): lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang / len par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang / skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur
106a1('bum): ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bsam
106a2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi
106a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
106a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta
106a5('bum): ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /
106a6('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag
106a7('bum): par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta ba
106b1('bum): dang / lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad med par lta ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
106b2('bum): par lta ba dang / rnam par thar bar lta ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta
106b3('bum): ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs
106b4('bum): par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir
106b5('bum): sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba
106b6('bum): dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
106b7('bum): po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
107a1('bum): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de
107a2('bum): la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi
107a3('bum): sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du
107a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma
107a5('bum): mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la'ang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
107a6('bum): slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
107a7('bum): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
107b1('bum): cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/
107b2('bum): chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par
107b3('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gang la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun
107b4('bum): nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /byang chub kyi sems med do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
107b5('bum): rgyas kyi sems med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams
107b6('bum): cad dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud pa med
107b7('bum): pa/ de lta bu'i sems la'ang chags pa med do/ zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bas na gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /
108a1('bum): 'du shes kyang chags pa med do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /mig kyang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'ang chags
108a2('bum): pa med do/ /sna'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'ang chags pa med do/ /lus kyang chags pa med do/ /yid kyang chags pa med do/ /gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /sgra'ang chags pa
108a3('bum): med do/ /dri'ang chags pa med do/ /ro'ang chags pa med do/ /reg kyang chags pa med do/ /chos kyang chags pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i
108a4('bum): rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa
108a5('bum): med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg
108a6('bum): pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang chags pa med do/ /
108a7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
108b1('bum): ba'ang chags pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
108b2('bum): gyis tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /sa'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /chu'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /me'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /rlung gi khams kyang chags pa med do/ /
108b3('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa med do/ /ma rig pa'ang chags pa med do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes

108b5('bum): pa'ang chags pa med do/ /len pa'ang chags pa med do/ /srid pa'ang chags pa med do/ /skye ba'ang chags pa med do/ /rga shi'ang chags pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang

108b7('bum): do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang chags pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags

109a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa
109a3('bum): med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /chos thams cad
109a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa

109a6('bum): dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /stobs rnams kyang chags pa med do//
109a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa med do/ /

109b6('bum): chags pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba'ang chags pa med do/ /'du shes kyang chags

115b1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams
115b2('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs

115b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

115b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs

123a1('bum): do/ /yang dag par spong ba med pa'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa
123a2('bum): med do/ /dbang po med pa'ang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do/ /stobs med pa'ang stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'ang byang chub kyi yan
123a3('bum): lag rnams la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa med
123a4('bum): pa'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan med pa'ang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do/ /tshad med pa med pa'ang tshad med pa rnams la
123a5('bum): la chags pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa med pa'ang
123a6('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med
123a7('bum): do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'ang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
123b1('bum): la chags pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa med pa'ang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang ting de 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do/ /gzungs kyi
123b2('bum): sgo med pa'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa
123b3('bum): med pa'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /byams pa chen po med pa'ang
123b4('bum): byams pa chen po la chags pa med do/ /snying rje chen po med pa'ang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
123b5('bum): rnams la chags pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid med pa'ang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes
123b6('bum): pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de
123b7('bum): bzhin te/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa med do/ /'du
124a1('bum): byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /mig med pa'ang mig la chags pa med do/ /
124a2('bum): rna ba med pa'ang rna ba la chags pa med do/ /sna med pa'ang sna la chags pa med do/ /lce med pa'ang lce la chags pa med do/ /lus med pa'ang lus la chags pa med do/ /yid med
124a3('bum): pa'ang yid la chags pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /sgra med pa'ang sgra la chags pa med do/ /dri med pa'ang dri la chags pa med do/ /ro med
124a4('bum): pa'ang ro la chags pa med do/ /reg med pa'ang reg la chags pa med do/ /chos med pa'ang chos la chags pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang mig gi rnam par
124a5('bum): shes pa la chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang sna'i rnam par shes pa la
124a6('bum): chags pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags
124a7('bum): pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa
124b1('bum): med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa
124b2('bum): med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang yid kyi
124b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ rna ba'i 'dus
124b4('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang sna'i 'dus
124b5('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /
124b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa'ang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
124b7('bum): med pa'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /sa'i khams med pa'ang sa'i khams la chags pa med do/ /chu'i khams med pa'ang chu'i khams
125a1('bum): la chags pa med do/ /me'i khams med pa'ang me'i khams la chags pa med do/ /rlung gi khams med pa'ang rlung gi khams la chags pa med do/ /nam mkha'i
125a2('bum): khams med pa'ang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'ang rnam par shes pa'i khams la chags pa med do/ /ma rig pa med pa'ang ma
125a3('bum): rig pa la chags pa med do/ /'du byed med pa'ang 'du byed la chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs med
125a4('bum): pa'ang ming dang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /skye mched drug med pa'ang skye mched drug la chags pa med do/ /reg pa med pa'ang reg pa la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med
125a5('bum): pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /sred pa med pa'ang sred pa la chags pa med do/ /len pa med pa'ang len pa la chags pa med do/ /srid pa med pa'ang srid pa la chags
125a6('bum): pa med do/ /skye ba med pa'ang skye ba la chags pa med do/ /rga shi med pa'ang rga shi la chags pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
125a7('bum): chags pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang bzod pa'i pha
125b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang
125b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang nang
125b3('bum): stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /stong pa nyid
125b4('bum): stong pa nyid med pa'ang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid med pa'ang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang
125b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa'ang 'dus ma byas
125b6('bum): stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med
125b7('bum): pa'ang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
126a1('bum): med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'ang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rang gi
126a2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /
126a3('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dngos po
126a4('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la
126a5('bum): chags pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba med pa'ang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa'ang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags
126a6('bum): pa med do/ dbang po med pa'ang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do/ /stobs med pa'ang stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag med pa'ang byang chub
126a7('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do/ /'phags
126b1('bum): pa'i bden pa med pa'ang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan med pa'ang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do/ /tshad med pa med pa'ang tshad med pa
126b2('bum): rnams la chags pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa med pa'ang
126b3('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'ang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /
126b4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa'ang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la chags pa
126b5('bum): med do/ /mngon par shes pa med pa'ang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo med
126b6('bum): pa'ang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa
126b7('bum): med pa'ang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'ang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /byams pa chen po med
127a1('bum): pa'ang byams pa chen po la chags pa med do/ /snying rje chen po med pa'ang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang
127a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid med pa'ang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
127a3('bum): med pa'ang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan
127a4('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ /
127a5('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlon sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /mngon
127a6('bum): par chags par 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
127a7('bum): ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi pa de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
127b1('bum): bka' stsal pa/ gang po/ khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni theg
127b2('bum): pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems
127b3('bum): dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems
127b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can nyung
127b5('bum): zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
127b6('bum): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du
127b7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/
128a1('bum): sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
128a2('bum): pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can nyung zad
128a3('bum): nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
128a4('bum): bsam gtan skyed do/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du shes
128a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su
128a6('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /
128a7('bum): sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpags pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems
128b1('bum): can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol
128b2('bum): tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag
128b3('bum): gis kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha
128b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
128b5('bum): rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams
128b6('bum): cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag
128b7('bum): gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems
129a1('bum): can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang stong
129a2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang chen po stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis
129a3('bum): kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
129a4('bum): par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad
129a5('bum): kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyor bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa
129a6('bum): stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
129a7('bum): la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis
129b1('bum): kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su
129b2('bum): rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems
129b3('bum): can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs
129b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /
129b5('bum): bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
129b6('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas
129b7('bum): par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang yang
130a1('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la
130a2('bum): sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can
130a3('bum): thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar
130a4('bum): bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /
130a5('bum): bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams
130a6('bum): la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ bdag kyang tshad med pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang
130a7('bum): tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i
130b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang rnam par thar ba brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag
130b2('bum): kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o/ /
130b3('bum): bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
130b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams
130b5('bum): la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
130b6('bum): gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams
130b7('bum): cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbyar
131a1('bum): bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /
131a2('bum): bdag kyang byams pa chen po la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang byams pa chen po la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can
131a3('bum): thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
131a4('bum): pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /zhes bya bar sems bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
131a5('bum): pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su
131a6('bum): gtong ba de dag / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i
131a7('bum): rtsa bas de 'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
131b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
131b2('bum): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems
131b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang
131b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa
131b5('bum): dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang
131b6('bum): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
131b7('bum): brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
132a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar
132a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
132a3('bum): sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam
132a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin
132a5('bum): pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa'ang mi
132a6('bum): dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs
132a7('bum): su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
132b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
132b2('bum): go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam
132b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
132b4('bum): byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
132b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
132b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'ang mos pa mi skyed na/ so so skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
132b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
133a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems
133a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a3('bum): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
133a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a5('bum): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go
133a6('bum): mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
133a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
133b1('bum): dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
133b2('bum): tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de'ang mi dmigs shing / dge
133b3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
133b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha
133b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
133b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
133b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
134a1('bum): yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i
134a2('bum): bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams
134a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
134a4('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
134a5('bum): radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de
134a6('bum): dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang
134a7('bum): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
134b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
134b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
134b3('bum): la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
134b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
134b5('bum): chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
134b6('bum): chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
134b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha
135a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin ta/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i
135a2('bum): bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/
135a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
135a4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
135a5('bum): shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma
135a6('bum): yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med
135a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
135b1('bum): pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
135b2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
135b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
135b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams
135b5('bum): par mi byed cing / bstun mi ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i
135b6('bum): bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
135b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam
136a1('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
136a2('bum): bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing /
136a3('bum): brtson 'grus de'ang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang
136a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
136a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /tshe
136a6('bum): dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
136a7('bum): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
136b1('bum): byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
136b2('bum): phyin pa'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
136b3('bum): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/
136b4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
136b5('bum): phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
136b6('bum): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla
136b7('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
137a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
137a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad
137a3('bum): dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
137a4('bum): pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa
137a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams
137a6('bum): kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bya ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
137a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
137b1('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de'ang
137b2('bum): mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
137b3('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
137b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang
137b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
137b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang
137b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang
138a1('bum): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
138a2('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun
138a3('bum): mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
138a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos
138a5('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing brten te/
138a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
138a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
138b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson
138b2('bum): 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
138b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
138b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems
138b5('bum): rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
138b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
138b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin
139a1('bum): gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas shes rab kyi phra rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams
139a2('bum): cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
139a3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
139a4('bum): sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
139a5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas
139a6('bum): shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
139a7('bum): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
139b1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro myong bar mi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med
139b2('bum): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
139b3('bum): pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
139b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong pas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi
139b5('bum): skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed do/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
139b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen
139b7('bum): po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po nga dgu pa/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
140a1('bum): de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched
140a2('bum): du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can
140a3('bum): yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go /lho phyogs kyi 'jig
140a4('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/
140a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
140a6('bum): su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
140a7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems
140b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra
140b2('bum): brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched
140b3('bum): du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin
140b4('bum): par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rdzes su sgrog go /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten
140b5('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad do/ /'jig rten gyi khams
140b6('bum): che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed
140b7('bum): do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs
141a1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub
141a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis
141a3('bum): rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
141a4('bum): bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen
141a5('bum): po dgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs
141a6('bum): rjes su sgrog go / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa
141a7('bum): ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig
141b1('bum): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go /'og gi
141b2('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/
141b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
141b4('bum): su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs
141b5('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa'
141b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o
141b7('bum): zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par
142a1('bum): zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la
142a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis
142a3('bum): dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam
142a4('bum): par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge
142a5('bum): 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing
142a6('bum): shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod
142a7('bum): pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba
142b1('bum): snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems
142b2('bum): rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
142b3('bum): nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad
142b4('bum): med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs
142b5('bum): pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs
142b6('bum): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs
142b7('bum): bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad
143a1('bum): med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
143a2('bum): nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par
143a3('bum): 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
143a4('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam
143a5('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes
143a6('bum): cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes
143a7('bum): med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems
143b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par
143b2('bum): gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de tshul
143b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
143b4('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam
143b5('bum): par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las
143b6('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la
143b7('bum): rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang
144a1('bum): spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan
144a2('bum): bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa
144a3('bum): med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas
144a4('bum): shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs
144a5('bum): su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam
144a6('bum): par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su
144a7('bum): rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par
144b1('bum): spyod do/ /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/
144b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par
144b3('bum): spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam
144b4('bum): mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
144b5('bum): te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
144b6('bum): par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
144b7('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam
145a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i
145a2('bum): rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
145a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas
145a4('bum): pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod
145a5('bum): pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde
145a6('bum): ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde
145a7('bum): ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum
145b1('bum): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med
145b2('bum): pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs
145b3('bum): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas
145b4('bum): par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod
145b5('bum): pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas
145b6('bum): shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa yongs su
145b7('bum): rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod
146a1('bum): do/ /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa
146a2('bum): med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/

146a4('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'
146a5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams
146a6('bum): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams

146b1('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs
146b2('bum): med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di

146b4('bum): kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par
146b5('bum): rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes
146b6('bum): pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang
146b7('bum): snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i
147a1('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga
147a2('bum): nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i

147b6('bum): so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod
147b7('bum): do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
148a1('bum): min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam

148b2('bum): bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/

149b1('bum): cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub

150a1('bum): myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la
150a2('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang
