150a7('bum): pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
150b1('bum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin
150b2('bum): tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
150b3('bum): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur
150b4('bum): cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas
150b5('bum): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
150b6('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du
150b7('bum): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa'
151a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam
151a2('bum): par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang pa'i tshe'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
151a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan
151a4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/

151a6('bum): mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/

151b1('bum): spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu
151b2('bum): bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de btang snyoms
151b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig
151b4('bum): rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i
151b5('bum): chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa
151b6('bum): dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga'
151b7('bum): ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas
152a1('bum): te/ /bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med
152a2('bum): pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde
152a3('bum): ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi
152a4('bum): 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam
152a5('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas
152a6('bum): so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod
152a7('bum): do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
152b1('bum): min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad
152b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de
152b3('bum): dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi nga ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/
152b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
152b5('bum): de dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas
152b6('bum): kyi sa'ang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems
152b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam
153a1('bum): par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa
153a2('bum): dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub
153a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
153a4('bum): de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
153a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
153a6('bum): bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
153a7('bum): kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
153b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan
153b2('bum): bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med
153b3('bum): pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i
153b4('bum): rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing /
153b5('bum): de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
153b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/
153b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa
154a1('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang po lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
154a2('bum): bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
154a3('bum): cad du bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom
154a4('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
154a5('bum): cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
154a6('bum): cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa dang /
154a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po bsgom pa
154b1('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid bsgom pa
154b2('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub
154b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par
154b4('bum): gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do/ /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying
154b5('bum): rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/ /dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/ /btang snyoms
154b6('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa
154b7('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam
155a1('bum): par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba
155a2('bum): 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems
155a3('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang
155a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i
155a5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab
155a6('bum): tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad
155a7('bum): med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
155b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi
155b2('bum): ro myong bar byed pa'ang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol
155b3('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
155b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi
155b5('bum): ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang dag par 'jug
155b6('bum): par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
155b7('bum): po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
156a1('bum): ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes
156a2('bum): kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes
156a3('bum): kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma
156a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/
156a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul
156a6('bum): gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes
156a7('bum): kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang
156b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang
156b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi
156b3('bum): rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /bdag med ces bya bar shes pa
156b4('bum): mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / stong zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi stong zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma yod
156b5('bum): ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug / mtshan ma med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / smon pa yod ces bya bar shes par mi 'jug /smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
156b6('bum): ti'i bu/ 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
156b7('bum): pa chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug /da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi
157a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'di la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
157a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'dod pa'i khams
157a3('bum): su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang med pa ste/
157a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
157a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang /
157a6('bum): 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa'ang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag
157a7('bum): pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
157b1('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/
157b2('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
157b3('bum): phyin pa'ang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i
157b4('bum): tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
157b5('bum): tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/
157b6('bum): yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /
157b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bzod
158a1('bum): pa'ang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems
158a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
158a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang
158a4('bum): chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
158a5('bum): gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
158a6('bum): gnas kyang / des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na
158a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
158b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang /
158b2('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi
158b3('bum): dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
158b4('bum): yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom
158b5('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du
158b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs
158b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
159a1('bum): gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de
159a2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de
159a3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du
159a4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
159a5('bum): du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
159a6('bum): don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
159a7('bum): bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
159b1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom
159b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
159b3('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
159b4('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
159b5('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
159b6('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
159b7('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par
160a1('bum): bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
160a2('bum): d pa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye
160a3('bum): bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang
160a4('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu
160a5('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
160a6('bum): dbang po lnga bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga

160b1('bum): bdun bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
160b2('bum): bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa
160b3('bum): bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi
160b4('bum): bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams
160b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /
160b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom mo/ /rnam
160b7('bum): p a thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
161a1('bum): dgu bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
161a2('bum): par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas
161a3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
161a4('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas

161a7('bum): pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom

161b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam
161b3('bum): par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
161b4('bum): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
161b5('bum): dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes
161b6('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'du shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
161b7('bum): tsam du zad do/ /'du byed dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
162a1('bum): tsam du zad do/ /mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rna ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad
162a2('bum): do/ /sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /lce dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /lus dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
162a3('bum): lus zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni

162a5('bum): pa'i phyir/ ro zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /reg dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ reg ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos zhes bya ba 'di
162a6('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med

162b1('bum): do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam par

162b7('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
163a1('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes

163a3('bum): zad do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yid
163a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sa'i khams dmigs
163a5('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chu'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /me'i khams
163a6('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ me'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rlung gi khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams zhas bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
163a7('bum): nam mkha'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par

163b6('bum): skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rga shi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
163b7('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
164a1('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
164a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs

164a4('bum): pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
164a5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs
164a6('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
164a7('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong pa
164b1('bum): nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs
164b2('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya
164b3('bum): ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i

164b5('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa stong
164b6('bum): pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs
164b7('bum): su med pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba
165a1('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yang dag par
165a2('bum): spong ba rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
165a3('bum): bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /dbang po rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ stobs
165a4('bum): lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i
165a5('bum): lam rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
165a6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /bsam gtan rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshad med
165a7('bum): pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs med
165b1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mthar
165b2('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
165b3('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
165b4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya pa 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di
165b5('bum): ni ming tsam du zad do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
165b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /so so yang
165b7('bum): dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /snying rje chen po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba
166a1('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming
166a2('bum): tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ma nor ba de bzhin
166a3('bum): nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos nyid
166a4('bum): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos kyi
166a5('bum): gnas nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /chos skyon med pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos skyon med pa nyid zhes bya ba
166a6('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang
166a7('bum): chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan
166b1('bum): pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya
166b2('bum): pa/ /bam po drug cu pa/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par
166b3('bum): shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang
166b4('bum): 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
166b5('bum): du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs
166b6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du
166b7('bum): shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can
167a1('bum): rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsam shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma
167a2('bum): gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa de dang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang /
167a3('bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis
167a4('bum): bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
167a5('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjed pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems
167a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams
167a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su sgrog pa mdzad do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
167b1('bum): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
167b2('bum): chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi
167b3('bum): 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
167b4('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/
167b5('bum): theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes
167b6('bum): grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa
167b7('bum): mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam
168a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs
168a2('bum): su brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod
168a3('bum): pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya
168a4('bum): ba zhig / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa
168a5('bum): mdzad do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /
168a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/
168a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad
168b1('bum): do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi
168b2('bum): khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad
168b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
168b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub
168b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad
168b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
168b7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na
169a1('bum): med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos
169a2('bum): kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
169a3('bum): bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i
169a4('bum): mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa
169a5('bum): sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /
169a6('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ go cha chen po bgos so/ /go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan
169a7('bum): 'das/ ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi pa lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
169b1('bum): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go
169b2('bum): cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
169b3('bum): phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ stong pa nyid
169b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ don dam ba stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/
169b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/
169b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ ngo bo nyid
169b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/
170a1('bum): dbang po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos/ lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam
170a2('bum): gtan gyi go cha bgos/ tshad med pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
170a3('bum): 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos/ ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/
170a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/
170a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
170a6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
170a7('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten
170b1('bum): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /shar lho'i
170b2('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas
170b3('bum): par 'gengs so/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
170b4('bum): ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
170b5('bum): 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
170b6('bum): snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
170b7('bum): snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
171a1('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug
171a2('bum): tu rab tu bskyod do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
171a3('bum): gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
171a4('bum): rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
171a5('bum): sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde
171a6('bum): ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
171a7('bum): dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ byol song gi skye
171b1('bum): gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
171b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba
171b3('bum): 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang
171b4('bum): gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems
171b5('bum): can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la
171b6('bum): phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go /de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag
171b7('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba des gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs
172a1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems
172a2('bum): can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
172a3('bum): zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang
172a4('bum): bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom
172a5('bum): ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji

178b7('bum): bai DUR+Ya'i rgyu las byung pa mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul pa byed do/ /de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi
179a1('bum): sbyin pa byed do/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do/ /bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do/ /gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed
179a2('bum): do/ /me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do/ /phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do/ /spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /byug pa 'dod pa rnams la
179a3('bum): byug pa'i sbyin pa byed do/ /mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do/ /khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do/ /'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do/ /yo
179a4('bum): byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung
179a5('bum): dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa
179a6('bum): byed pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ skom 'dod pa la skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa byin/
179a7('bum): gos 'dod pa la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa la
179b1('bum): mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu
179b2('bum): tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul byin pa
179b3('bum): nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can
179b4('bum): de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab
179b5('bum): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang
179b6('bum): po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la
179b7('bum): ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal
180a1('bum): cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/
180a2('bum): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byang byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams
180a3('bum): la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam
180a4('bum): du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
180a5('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/
180a6('bum): skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa
180a7('bum): rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni sbos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni
180b1('bum): khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byang byin/ nor bu dang /
180b2('bum): mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser
180b3('bum): dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung
180b4('bum): na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
180b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / ched du bsams te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing de 'khor
180b6('bum): los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
180b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
181a1('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
181a2('bum): smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi
181a3('bum): sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
181a4('bum): pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan
181a5('bum): pa de dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor
181a6('bum): 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang /
181a7('bum): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
181b1('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
181b2('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
181b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
181b4('bum): pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las
181b5('bum): kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
181b6('bum): bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
181b7('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags
182a1('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so
182a2('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
182a3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/
182a4('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
182a5('bum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par
182a6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i
182a7('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
182b1('bum): bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i
182b2('bum): chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /
182b3('bum): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing
182b4('bum): rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
182b5('bum): pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad
182b6('bum): bdag la rdo dang / dbyig pas brdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go cha bgo ba byed cing / sems
182b7('bum): can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis
183a1('bum): lam po che'i bzhi 'dor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar ba
183a2('bum): dang / rab tu dgod pa byas na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
183a3('bum): bzhag pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
183a4('bum): pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
183a5('bum): rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha
183a6('bum): chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad
183a7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go / 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
183b1('bum): phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems
183b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing
183b3('bum): gzhog go / 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs
183b4('bum): kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
183b5('bum): mchan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
183b6('bum): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus
183b7('bum): dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/
184a1('bum): de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184a2('bum): po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor/
184a3('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par
184a4('bum): bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la'ang
184a5('bum): 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam
184a6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god par byed de/ de ltar yang dag par bskul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
184a7('bum): byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
184b1('bum): po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam
184b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
184b3('bum): pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184b4('bum): pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
184b5('bum): de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes
184b6('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
184b7('bum): la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go / 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can
185a1('bum): thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
185a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ tshu rol
185a3('bum): tam/ pha rol tu mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can
185a4('bum): thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go / 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
185a5('bum): mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
185a6('bum): pa la yang dag par bskul te bzhag cing bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab
185a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
185b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir
185b2('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
185b3('bum): go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
185b4('bum): bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang /
185b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/
