235b4('bum): gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngor 'dzin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul du
235b5('bum): mi gnas pa ste/ 'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
235b6('bum): gnas shing / ji ltar rgyal mtshan dam pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin thams cad las 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dbang
235b7('bum): po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa ste/ 'di ni dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
236a1('bum): de la rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / rgyun gyi rjes su ma log par yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ 'di ni rgyun gyi
236a2('bum): rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / rdul dang dri ma thams cad rab tu spangs
236a3('bum): pa'i dbang du gyur cing / ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du dbang thob pas bsgyings pa lta bu ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la seng ge rnam par skyong
236a4('bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / cho 'phrul dam pa'i dbang thob pas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba med cing / bdud thams cad kyi dpung 'jig cing
236a5('bum): 'dul bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par skyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
236a6('bum): spobs pa dam pa dang ldan pas 'khor mang po'i nang du bag tsha ba med par mu stegs can log par ldan pa thams cad 'dul ba ste/ 'di ni seng ge rnam par glal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
236a7('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams rgyun gcod par byed pa ste/ 'di ni snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge
236b1('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la chags pa dang thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad la 'dzin pa dang thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ni chags
236b2('bum): pa dang thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu
236b3('bum): sel ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
236b4('bum): lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
236b5('bum): chos gang yang 'tshol ba med pa ste/ 'di ni 'tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
236b6('bum): gnas shing / chos gang yang gnas la brten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems med pa zhes bya
236b7('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems kyang mi 'byung sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bdud
237a1('bum): bzhi 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / bdud bzhi'i dgra thams cad 'dul bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni bdud bzhi 'dul ba
237a2('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma med par byed pa ste/ 'di
237a3('bum): ni dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od
237a4('bum): mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od byed
237a5('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba
237a6('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni
237a7('bum): dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba ste/ 'di ni
237b1('bum): 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur
237b2('bum): ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed
237b3('bum): pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad shes pa
237b4('bum): dang / zad mi shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
237b5('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
237b6('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang dpal gyis 'bar bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad pa dang bral ba
237b7('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad mi shes par rjes su mthong nas/ rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar
238a1('bum): mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
238a2('bum): 'dzin thams cad mi g.yo mi 'gul rab tu mi 'byed/ rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
238a3('bum): na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / mnyam par bzhag pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
238a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
238a5('bum): de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
238a6('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba dri med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mun pa med par byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma med pa
238a7('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mig yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / mig lnga yongs su dag par byed pa ste/ 'di ni mig
238b1('bum): yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa
238b2('bum): thams cad sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
238b3('bum): 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
238b4('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba dang zla ba bzhin du gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i
238b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i
238b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ye shes dpal
238b7('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpal yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni ye shes dpal zhes
239a1('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid
239a2('bum): kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar khong du chud par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
239a3('bum): zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems mi g.yo rnam par mi g.yo rnam par mi ldog /yongs su yi chad par mi 'gyur/ nyams su mi bde ba med la/ de la sems
239a4('bum): zhes bya ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems mi 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
239a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya
239a6('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
239a7('bum): de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin chen mtha' ltar kun nas snang ba ste/ 'di ni rin chen
239b1('bum): mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgya med pa'i
239b2('bum): mthas phyag rgyas btab pa nye bar bzung bas phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya
239b3('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad mnyam pa
239b4('bum): nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi
239b5('bum): dga' ba spong ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
239b6('bum): chos thams cad kyi mun pa sel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos
239b7('bum): kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'phags shing yongs su rgyas pa ste/
240a1('bum): 'di ni chos kyis 'phags pas yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de
240a2('bum): la gnas shing / yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi 'byung khungs su gyur pa ste/ 'di ni rin po che nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i
240a3('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'jig rten gyi rtsod pa dang / 'khrug pa rnam pa sna tshogs spong ba ste/ 'di ni 'khrug pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de
240a4('bum): la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste/ 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
240a5('bum): to/ /de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab
240a6('bum): tu 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
240a7('bum): chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid nges par 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dri ma med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
240b1('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / spyod pa mtha' yas pa rnam par dag par bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni dri ma med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ de la yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i
240b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de
240b3('bum): la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang dmigs pa med pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya
240b4('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmigs pa chad par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni
240b5('bum): dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa ste/
240b6('bum): 'di ni 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang dmigs
240b7('bum): pa med pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad
241a1('bum): kyi ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa yang dag pa'i mtha' rtogs par byed pa ste/ 'di ni ming dang mtshan ma la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bya ba
241a2('bum): dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / bya ba thams cad kun spong ba ste/ 'di ni bya ba dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ming nges
241a3('bum): par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni yang dag par dmigs su med cing tha snyad la bltos pa tsam mo zhes
241a4('bum): rtog par 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
241a5('bum): 'dzin thams cad kyi gnas dmigs pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
241a6('bum): de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba ste/ 'di ni rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
241a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la g.yo ba med
241b1('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
241b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di
241b3('bum): ni yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams
241b4('bum): cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems med par
241b5('bum): gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems mi 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
241b6('bum): to/ de la nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin de dag la sems nges par gnas kyang / de'i mtshan nyid dmigs su med
241b7('bum): par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni nges par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting
242a1('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de
242a2('bum): la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni
242a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams
242a4('bum): cad la spobs pa mtha' yas pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mtha' yas sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
242a5('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / ji ltar sgron ma gsal bas chos thams cad rab tu snang bar byed pa de lta bu ste/ 'di ni mtha' yas sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mi mnyam pa
242a6('bum): dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang
242a7('bum): mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / khams gsum pa thams cad las
242b1('bum): yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
242b2('bum): shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting
242b3('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad la nem nur rnam par sel ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes
242b4('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/
242b5('bum): 'di ni gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang gnyis
242b6('bum): su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
242b7('bum): 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes
243a1('bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam
243a2('bum): pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
243a3('bum): gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spyod pa dam pa zhes bya
243a4('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / snyoms par 'jug pa de las spyod pa dam pa sna tshogs ston kyang / gang la yang 'dzin pa med pa ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dam
243a5('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams
243a6('bum): cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas/ de la zhugs pa'i phyir khong du mi chud pa gang yang med pa ste/ 'di ni rtogs pas srid pa gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i
243a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi brda dang sgra la 'jug pa ste/ 'di
243b1('bum): ni brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'gyur ba dang 'jigs pa med cing
243b2('bum): yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i rin chen rgyud dam pa sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni rin chen snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad la chags pa med pa zhes bya
243b3('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos gang la'ang chags pa med pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad la chags pa med
243b4('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyed pas mun pa mun nag
243b5('bum): sel ba dang / gzhan yang yon tan mtha' yas pa brgya 'god pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba zhes bya ba'i
243b6('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags mtha' yas pa spong ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /
243b7('bum): de la chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
244a1('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos rnams kyi chos dang gang zag la bdag med par
244a2('bum): gsal bar ston pa ste/ 'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de
244a3('bum): la gnas shing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul phyir mi ldog pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa dam pa bsgrub pa ste/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i
244a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yi ge dang bral bar rjes su mthong ba
244a5('bum): ste/ 'di ni sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
244a6('bum): gzi brjid kyis lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
244a7('bum): de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mngon par dmigs pa
244b1('bum): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par dmigs pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mngon par
244b2('bum): dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa 'thob
244b3('bum): pa ste/ 'di ni ma 'dres pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
244b4('bum): 'dzin thams cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
244b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya kun tu 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bde ba dang sdug
244b6('bum): bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang dag par rjes su
244b7('bum): mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
245a1('bum): de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad par rung bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzungs
245a2('bum): kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la
245a3('bum): yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag pa dang / log par yang
245a4('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa dang / log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi
245a5('bum): bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'gal ba dang
245a6('bum): 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge
245a7('bum): 'dzin thams cad la mthun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
245b1('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snying po dang ldan
245b2('bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
245b3('bum): to/ /de la zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs
245b4('bum): su rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / dag cing
245b5('bum): gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems can gyi ris snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
245b6('bum): shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyan chen po dang ldan par 'gyur pa ste/ 'di ni rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gdung ba med pa'i glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting
245b7('bum): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyis sems can gyi ris snang bar byas shing mun pa mun nag gi tsha ba'i gdung ba sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni gdung ba med pa'i glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge
246a1('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa
246a2('bum): ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'jig
246a3('bum): rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skyob pa ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad skyob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
246a4('bum): de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa'ang mi dmigs/ rtse gcig kyang mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdul med
246a5('bum): cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad rdul can dang rdul dang bral bar
246a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting
246a7('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa med par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting
246b1('bum): nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa dang
246b2('bum): bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba
246b3('bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye
246b4('bum): bar mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting
246b5('bum): nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snod las
246b6('bum): rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / mnyam par bzhag pa'i mthus yon tan mang po bskyed de/ ji ltar lha dag bsod nams kyi mthus kha zas
246b7('bum): mang po dag snod las rang 'byung bar 'gyur ba lta bu ste/ 'di ni snod las rang 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
247a1('bum): na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi tha ba ma lus par sreg pa ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ye
247a2('bum): shes chen po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ye shes kyi 'od kyis thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge
247a3('bum): 'dzin to/ /de la stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
247a4('bum): ste/ 'di ni stobs bcu'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi
247a5('bum): don du dam pa'i chos kyi sgo phye bas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po las myur du sgrol ba ste/ 'di ni sgo rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya
247a6('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ngag gi skyon
247a7('bum): rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par
247b1('bum): 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi
247b2('bum): ngag gi las mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la
247b3('bum): gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yid kyi las mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni yid kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
247b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi dbang po'i bye brag la kun tu rtog cing grol bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun tu rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting
247b5('bum): nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin du sems can rnams la snyoms par phan 'dogs pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nam
247b6('bum): mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol
247b7('bum): zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
248a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u brgyad pa'o// //rab 'byor/ gzhan
248a2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
248a3('bum): dang / sems dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /de la lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus
248a4('bum): la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing /
248a5('bum): rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa
248a6('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi nang gi lus la de
248a7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par
248b1('bum): spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go / nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/
248b2('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi'i tshor
248b3('bum): ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par
248b4('bum): bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
248b5('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam
248b6('bum): par mi rtog go / nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang
248b7('bum): yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi'i sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta
249a1('bum): zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par
249a2('bum): spyod kyang / sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
249a3('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams
249a4('bum): la rnam par mi rtog go / nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags
249a5('bum): sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /phyi'i chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
249a6('bum): kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang chos dang
249a7('bum): ldan pa rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go / phyi nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang
249b1('bum): ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go /rab 'byor/ ji ltar
249b2('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gro na 'gro'o
249b3('bum): zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /de'i lus nyams bde ba dang
249b4('bum): nyams mi bde'ang rung ste/ ji lta ji ltar gnas pa/ de lta de ltar nges par rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i
249b5('bum): tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod
249b6('bum): do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /de 'gro'am 'ong yang shes
249b7('bum): bzhin du spyod pa yin/ lta 'am rnam par lta'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum mam brkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ sbyar ma dang lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin
250a1('bum): du spyod pa yin/ zos pa dang 'chos pa dang 'thungs pa dang / myangs pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nyal ba dang gnyid kyi mya myo bsal ba la'ang shes
250a2('bum): bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'greng ba dang 'dug pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ gnyid kyis log gam/ ma log na'ang shes
250a3('bum): bzhin du spyod pa yin/ smra ba dang mi smra na'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la'ang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems
250a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa
250a5('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
250a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu na'ang / dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na'ang / dran zhing dbugs
250a7('bum): phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs nang du ring du rgyu na'ang / dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na'ang / dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes
250b1('bum): bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu na'ang / dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyu na'ang / phyir dbugs thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu
250b2('bum): shes te/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'am/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni/ ring du bskor na ring du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu
250b3('bum): shes so/ /thung ngu bskor na thung ngu bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
250b4('bum): dran par dbugs nang du brgyus na'ang / dran par dbugs nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran par dbugs phyir brgyus na'ang / dran par dbugs phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu
250b5('bum): shes so/ /dbugs ring du nang du brgyus na'ang / dbugs ring du nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs ring du phyir brgyus na'ang / dbugs ring du phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar
250b6('bum): rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus na'ang / dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus na'ang / dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus so zhes
250b7('bum): bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus
251a1('bum): kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa ngan pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal
251a2('bum): cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/ /
251a3('bum): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
251a4('bum): ba lang gi shen pa'am/ ba lang gi shen pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon po thogs te/ ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshags te/ de ltar so sor phye nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste/
251a5('bum): de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'ang / lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/ /chu'i khams dang /
251a6('bum): me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
251a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'greng ngam 'dug ste/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/
251b1('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
251b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang klad pa man chad du sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar
251b3('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying
251b4('bum): dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / tshil dang /
251b5('bum): snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya
251b6('bum): bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chun pa'i sgye snod til dang / yungs kar dang sran chung dang / bal sran dang / nas dang / gro dang /
251b7('bum): 'bras dang / 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba mig dang ldan pa'i mi zhig gis phye ste/ bltas na 'di ni til lo/ /'di ni yungs kar ro/ /'di ni sran chung ngo / /'di ni bal sran no/ /'di ni nas
252a1('bum): so/ /'di ni gro'o/ /'di ni 'bras so/ /'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
252a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang / spyi bo man chad sen mo dang / spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar
252a3('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang /
252a4('bum): mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtshor pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rdul dang / tshil
252a5('bum): dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang
252a6('bum): yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go/ //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug cu rtsa bzhi pa/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar
252a7('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
252b1('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
252b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs/ dur khrod du bor ba/ ro'i mal du bsnyal ba/ shi nas zhag gcig lon
252b3('bum): pa'am/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag gsum lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am/ rnam par bam pa'am/ rnam par bsngos
252b4('bum): pa'am/ rnam par rnags pa 'am/ rnam par zos pa'am/ rnam par 'thor ba mthong na/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can no/ /'di lta bu'i rang
252b5('bum): bzhin can te/ chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
252b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid
252b7('bum): mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod du bor
253a1('bum): ba'i ro/ shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am/ shi nas zhag bdun lon pa'am/ bya rog gam/ khwa 'am/ 'ol ba'am/ bya rgod dam/ spyang ki'am/ /wa'am
253a2('bum): khyi'am/ de ma yin pa'i srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis bza' ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang de lta bu'i chos can/ de lta
253a3('bum): bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid de lta bu las ma 'das so zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
253a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags
253a5('bum): sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
253a6('bum): tshe/ nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos pa/ mi gtsang bas rnags pa/ sungs pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang tshul 'di lta bu'i chos
253a7('bum): can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
253b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags
253b2('bum): sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur
253b3('bum): khrod kyi rus pa/ keng rus sha ra ri dang / khrag ra ri chags pa/ rgyus pas brang breng du 'brel ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can/
253b4('bum): 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
253b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems
253b6('bum): dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod
253b7('bum): kyi rus pa keng rus sha dang khrag med pa/ rgyus pa'i gzungs med pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta
254a1('bum): bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems
254a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang
254a3('bum): ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
254a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus gzungs med pa gyes pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa/ sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong ba de'i tshe/
254a5('bum): de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog
254a6('bum): go / rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta
254a7('bum): zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
254b1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa sa la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su rnam par 'thor ba/ rkang pa'i
254b2('bum): rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ byin pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ brla'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ tshigs pa'i rus
254b3('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ mjing pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ mgo'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor ba mthong na/ de
254b4('bum): lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/
254b5('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus
254b6('bum): can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
254b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa/ rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa/ dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de
255a1('bum): lus 'di nyid kyang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di'ang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das
255a2('bum): pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
255a3('bum): gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /
255a4('bum): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa rab rib snang ba/ sngon por
255a5('bum): gyur pa thi ba'i mdog ltar gyur pa/ zegs pa brul ba sa'i rdul dang 'gran 'gren du gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i
255a6('bum): chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por shes
255a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig
255b1('bum): rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi'i lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/
255b2('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing /
255b3('bum): brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs
255b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam
255b5('bum): par spyod do/ /phyi'i tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang
255b6('bum): yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang
255b7('bum): ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson
256a1('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi'i
256a2('bum): sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde
256a3('bum): ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/
256a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /nang gi chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes
256a5('bum): bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi'i chos la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes
256a6('bum): su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi chos la
256a7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal
256b1('bum): cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
256b2('bum): po ni/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sdig to mi dge
256b3('bum): ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam
256b4('bum): 'debs so/ /sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /
256b5('bum): yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu
256b6('bum): bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/
256b7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs te/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang byang chub sems
257a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar rdzu

257a3('bum): ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo/ /

260a1('bum): dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag

260a7('bum): gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe
260b1('bum): na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mtshan ma
260b2('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med par rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
260b3('bum): ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med do zhes mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa smon pa med pa rnam par
260b4('bum): thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo de dag la zhum pa med par dran par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub
260b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig
260b6('bum): gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su
260b7('bum): rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/ /de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa'o/ /de la kun
261a1('bum): 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa'o/ /de la lam
261a2('bum): shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes bya'o/ /de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad par shes pa'o/ /de la mi skye ba
261a3('bum): shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rgyud skye ba med par shes pa'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing shes pa'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang
261a4('bum): zhe na/ mig mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus mi rtag ces bya
261a5('bum): bar shes pa dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro mi
261a6('bum): rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mig gi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs kyi khams mi
261a7('bum): rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar
261b1('bum): shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
261b2('bum): shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mi
261b3('bum): rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg bya'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya
261b4('bum): bar shes pa dang / yid kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos kyi khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa
261b5('bum): dang / sa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chu'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / me'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rlung gi khams mi rtag ces bya bar
261b6('bum): shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ma rig pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / 'du byed
261b7('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye mched drug mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /
262a1('bum): reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sred pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / len pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes
262a2('bum): pa dang / srid pa mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rga shi mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o/ /de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan dang
262a3('bum): gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o/ /de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gis lam shes pa dang / yongs su byang ba shes pa'o/ /de la sgra ji bzhin gshegs pa gang
262a4('bum): zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
262a5('bum): theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yongs su ma shes
262a6('bum): pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o/ /de la yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes
262a7('bum): par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
262b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o/ /de la yongs su shes pa'i
262b2('bum): dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa yongs su shes par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
262b3('bum): shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag mi slo ba pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs
262b4('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
262b5('bum): shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
262b6('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas
262b7('bum): shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod
263a1('bum): pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i
263a2('bum): chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di
263a3('bum): ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis
263a4('bum): pa'i bar te/ 'di ni rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / bsam
263a5('bum): gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
263a6('bum): dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms
263a7('bum): par 'jug pa'o/ /'di ni mi rtag mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
263b1('bum): po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
263b2('bum): dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran
263b3('bum): pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
263b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med
263b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems
263b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben
263b7('bum): pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/
264a1('bum): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
264a2('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa
264a3('bum): rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
264a4('bum): de bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs
264a5('bum): su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi'o/ de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub
264a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs
264a7('bum): med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas
264b1('bum): par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod
264b2('bum): pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas
264b3('bum): shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su
264b4('bum): rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /
264b5('bum): de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu
264b6('bum): bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod
264b7('bum): do/ /de dag ni tshad med pa bzhi'o/ /de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
265a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs
265a2('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'
265a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad
265a4('bum): du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung
265a5('bum): zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
265a6('bum): 'jug pa bzhi'o/ /de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang
265a7('bum): ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs
265b1('bum): kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam
265b2('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha'
265b3('bum): yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung
265b4('bum): zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
265b5('bum): min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i
265b6('bum): bar du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/
265b7('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/
266a1('bum): dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog
266a2('bum): pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba
266a3('bum): can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus
266a4('bum): kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar
266a5('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang mang sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang
266a6('bum): snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i
266a7('bum): 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
266b1('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
266b2('bum): gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa
266b3('bum): thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med
266b4('bum): 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni mthar gyis gnas
266b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu
266b6('bum): gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/
266b7('bum): gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su len pa'i rnam
267a1('bum): par smin pa'i gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten ni khams sna tshogs can te/ 'jig
267a2('bum): rten ni khams du ma'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji
267a3('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i
267a4('bum): lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
267a5('bum): par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/
267a6('bum): tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba dang / tshe rabs bye ba brgya dang / tshe rabs bye ba stong dang /
267a7('bum): tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag kyang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang /
267b1('bum): bskal pa brgya phrag stong nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar dag kyang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go /ming ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /rigs ni
