267b2('bum): 'di zhes bya'o/ /rus ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /zas ni 'di za za'o/ /yun ni 'di srid gcig tu gnas gnas so/ /tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo
267b3('bum): zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mas sngon gyi gnas rjes
267b4('bum): su dran no/ /lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa
267b5('bum): dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dod ba'i sems can rnams rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang
267b6('bum): ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song
267b7('bum): log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa
268a1('bum): dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du
268a2('bum): skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa/ rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon du byas
268a3('bum): te/ nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par spyod do/ /bdag gi skye ba ni zad do/ /bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/ /bya ba ni byas so/ /rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni med do zhes bya bar rab tu shes
268a4('bum): te/ rab 'byor/ de'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
268a5('bum): po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs
268a6('bum): ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya
268a7('bum): ba'i rgyu'ang / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam
268b1('bum): par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha'am/ bdud
268b2('bum): dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su'ang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di
268b3('bum): rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol
268b4('bum): bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa
268b5('bum): thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/
268b6('bum): lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su'ang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan
268b7('bum): pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su'ang rung
269a1('bum): ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang /
269a2('bum): bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig
269a3('bum): rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su'ang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang
269a4('bum): bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag
269a5('bum): par zad par 'gyur bar ma 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas med de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su'ang rung
269a6('bum): ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa
269a7('bum): dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go /tshangs pa'i
269b1('bum): 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su'ang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar
269b2('bum): bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
269b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges
269b4('bum): pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
269b5('bum): chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/ bco brgyad gang zhe na/
269b6('bum): gang gis nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gis nam la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ bdud dang
269b7('bum): bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis rjes su
270a1('bum): bstan te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la
270a2('bum): 'khrul pa mi mnga'o/ /ca co mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o/ /ma brtags pa'i btang
270a3('bum): snyoms mi mnga'o/ /mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su
270a4('bum): nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa
270a5('bum): mi mnga'o/ /sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes mngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes
270a6('bum): su 'brang ngo / /thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa
270a7('bum): 'jug go / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go /da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ rab
270b1('bum): 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
270b2('bum): theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang / brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa ste/ de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug
270b3('bum): pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa ston pa'i phyir chos
270b4('bum): thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ca zhes bya ba ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med pas chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /na zhes bya ba ni ming dang bral zhing ming
270b5('bum): gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /la zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i 'khri shing dang rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams
270b6('bum): cad kyi sgo'o/ /da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ba zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /Da zhes
270b7('bum): bya ba ni dkrugs ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa mi dmigs pas chags par mi 'gyur/ 'ching bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /
271a1('bum): ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos
271a2('bum): thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sta zhes bya ba ni khengs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams
271a3('bum): cad kyi sgo'o/ /ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du mi dmigs pas mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir chos
271a4('bum): thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ma zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tha zhes
271a5('bum): bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ja zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /shwa zhes bya ba ni dbugs dmigs su med pa'i
271a6('bum): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams
271a7('bum): cad kyi sgo'o/ /kha zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
271b1('bum): sgo'o/ /sta zhes bya ba ni sdod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni ye shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rta zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs
271b2('bum): pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
271b3('bum): sgo'o/ /tsha zhes bya ba ni mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /hwa zhes bya ba ni bod pa mi dmigs
271b4('bum): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tas zhes bya ba ni mos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /g+ha zhes bya ba ni sdug pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /
271b5('bum): tha zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ma zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pas gang yang 'gro ba med cing 'ong pa med de/ /gnas med cing 'dug pa med
271b6('bum): pa la nyal bar 'gyur ba med pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ska zhes bya ba ni phung
271b7('bum): po dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /yas zhes bya ba ni mi bde ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos
272a1('bum): thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /Ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /D+ha zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba mi dmigs pas mtha'
272a2('bum): thug par gnas par 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ de yan chad yi ge'i tha snyad med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la'ang gang gis tha snyad
272a3('bum): du bya ba dang / /gang gis brjod pa dang / gang gis bstan pa dang / gang gis bri ba dang / gang snang ba dang / gang klag par bya ba de lta bu'i ming gang yang med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta
272a4('bum): ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' bzhin du chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo la 'jug pa a la sogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
272a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis a la sogs pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su shes na/ de ni sgra gang la'ang chags par mi 'gyur te/ thams cad chos nyid
272a6('bum): kyis yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur zhing sgra shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya
272a7('bum): 'di dang / a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing gzhan la pa'ang tshul dang
272b1('bum): ldan pa'i blos ston na/ de la legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan/ blo gros dang ldan/ rtogs pa dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ dga' ba dang
272b2('bum): ldan/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan/ spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di'ang nyon mongs pa med par thob cing the tshom med par 'gyur la/ gzhan las ngag snyan pa thos
272b3('bum): kyang chags par 'gyur ba med cing zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang khong khro bar mi 'gyur bas/ mtho ba med cing dma' ba med de/ tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sgra la mkhas par 'gyur
272b4('bum): ba dang / phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / skye mched la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bden pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar
272b5('bum): 'byung ba la mkhas te/ rgyu la mkhas shing rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /
272b6('bum): 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i rna ba shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyi sems shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / sngon gyi
272b7('bum): gnas rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /
273a1('bum): gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba
273a2('bum): dang / spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa la mkhas pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo a la sogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa
273a3('bum): 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u dgu pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po re lnga pa/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la
273a4('bum): yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing sa nas sar 'phar te/ rab 'byor/
273a5('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas chos gang
273a6('bum): yang 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med de/ 'pho ba'am nye bar 'pho ba med do/ /'on kyang chos thams cad kyi sa gang yin pa de la rlom sems su byed pa'am/ sems pa med de/ sa yongs
273b1('bum): su sbyong ba'ang mi byed pa ma yin la/ sa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sa dang
273b2('bum): po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su sbyong ba bcu po 'di dag bya ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs
273b3('bum): pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang zhing sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid
273b4('bum): yongs su sbyang ba dang / sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / des rlom sems su mi bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
273b5('bum): bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba
273b6('bum): dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su spyad pa dang / chos kyi rnam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos rnam
273b7('bum): par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yang dag pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ nga rgyal dang khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bden pa'i
274a1('bum): tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/ rab 'byor/ yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas
274a2('bum): pas bya ba dag go / rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yang du yid la bya ste/ de la
274a3('bum): nan tan du bya'o/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba dang / bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang / rab tu dga'
274a4('bum): zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba dang / snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang / bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba dang / pha rol
274a5('bum): tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing rtsom pa ste/ rab 'byor/ chos brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas yang dang yang du yid la
274a6('bum): bya zhing de dag la nan tan du bya ba dag go / rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la gnas par bya ste/ lnga gang
274a7('bum): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mang du thos pas mi ngoms shing de la'ang yi ge la mngon par ma zhen pa dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed cing nges kyang rlom sems su
274b1('bum): mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / yongs su bsngo'ang des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang / dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su
274b2('bum): skyo ba med cing / des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas kyang des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor/ chos lnga po de dag ni/ byang chub
274b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gsum pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba dag go / rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/
274b4('bum): chos bcu po 'di dag yongs su blangs shing gnas par bya ste/ de dag yongs su btang bar mi bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dgon pa la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang /
274b5('bum): chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi btang ba dang / bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i
274b6('bum): sems bskyed pa dang / rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba dang / sems zhum pa med pa dang / dngos po thams cad la bltos pa med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ chos bcu po de dag ni byang chub
274b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas yongs su btang bar mi bya zhing yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dag go / rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
275a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas chos drug po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di ltar khyim pa dang bsten pa
275a2('bum): yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dge slong ma dang bsten pa dang / rigs la ser sna byed pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas dang / gnod sems dang / bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa ste/
275a3('bum): chos drug po de dag ni yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /yang chos bco brgyad yongs su spang bar bya ste/ 'di ltar mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /lhag pa'i
275a4('bum): nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / the tshom dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su 'dor ba ste/ chos bco brgyad po de dag ni byang
275a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa
275a6('bum): la gnas pas chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /gzhan yang chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi
275a7('bum): sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /srid pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /slong mo pa mthong na zhum pa med par bya
275b1('bum): ste/ zhum pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya ste/ yid mi bde ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /slong mo pa mthong na
275b2('bum): slong mo pas 'khrug par mi bya ste/ 'khrug pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos drug po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas
275b3('bum): pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu mi bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag
275b4('bum): tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /sems can du 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /srog tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /rtag par 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /
275b5('bum): mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya'o/ /rgyur lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags pa dang / phung po la mngon par chags pa dang / khams la mngon par chags pa dang / skye
275b6('bum): mched la mngon par chags pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par chags pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la brten pa dang / khams gsum
275b7('bum): la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par
276a1('bum): chags pa dang / tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid
276a2('bum): dang 'gal ba ste/ rab 'byor/ chos nyi shu po de dag ni bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /des chos nyi shu po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid rdzogs par
276a3('bum): bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba dang / smon pa med pa shes par bya ba dang / 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba dang /
276a4('bum): sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs shing / des rlom sems su mi bya ba dang / mi skye ba la bzod pa dang / mi skye ba
276a5('bum): shes pa dang / chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang / rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba dang / lta ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / zhi gnas
276a6('bum): dang / lhag mthong gis dang / dul ba'i sems dang / zhi ba'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa dang / byams pa'i skabs shes pa dang / gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba dang / thams cad
276a7('bum): du bdag gi ngo bo ston pa ste/ rab 'byor/ chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ /
276b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad
276b2('bum): kyi sems khong du chud par bya ba dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su bsgrub pa dang /
276b3('bum): sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/ rab 'byor/ bzhi po de dag ni yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
276b4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa dang /
276b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par
276b6('bum): 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir ched du bsams shing srid pa nye bar len pa ste/ rab 'byor/ chos bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
276b7('bum): sa brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongs
277a1('bum): su rdzogs par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su gzung ba ste/ ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum
277a2('bum): tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa dang / yongs
277a3('bum): su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes pa dang / ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgyud phun sum tshogs pa dang /
277a4('bum): rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum
277a5('bum): tshogs pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rab 'byor/ tshes bcu gnyis po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa
277a6('bum): dgu pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du brjod
277a7('bum): do/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
277b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongs su sbyang ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
277b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po yang dag par sdud pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
277b3('bum): po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la sogs pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
277b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can thams cad kyi don du theg pa chen po'i ye shes 'tshol zhing sgrub par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa'i dngos
277b5('bum): po yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad
277b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ tshad med pa bzhi ste/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
277b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang
278a1('bum): ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med par sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
278a2('bum): po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang de la rnam pa
278a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog par byed pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
278a4('bum): gnyen te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bla ma la phu dung du bya ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
278a5('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams
278a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas chos 'tshol zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi lhung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
278a7('bum): chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzi med
278b1('bum): par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung yang de la bar chad byed pa gang yang med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung
278b2('bum): ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas/ nam rnam pa
278b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur gyi bar du/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas
278b4('bum): kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
278b5('bum): po de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston cing / thog mar yang dge ba/ bar du'ang dge ba/ tha mar yang
278b6('bum): dge ba/ yi ge bzang po/ don bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di lta ste/ mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /
278b7('bum): lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa
279a1('bum): brjod pa dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa dag yang dag par ston pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye
279a2('bum): ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ nga rgyal dang / khengs pa ji ltar bsal
279a3('bum): ba des/ nam yang rigs dma' bar ma skye ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa bsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems
279a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden
279a5('bum): pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /rab 'byor/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su sbyang ba bcu'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
279a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la mi byed cing / de ma yin pa'i tshul khrims ngan par byed pa
279a7('bum): dang / byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag kyang yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/ /de
279b1('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/
279b2('bum): phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba zad kyi bar du chud mi gzon na/ mang po lta ci smos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba'o/ /
279b3('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems med cing 'tshe ba med pa'i sems te/ 'di ni byang
279b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di
279b5('bum): lta ste/ sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba'o/ /de la byang
279b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
279b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
280a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems shing bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang bskal pa
280a2('bum): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lam bkod kyi bar du/ de dag tu gtub cing gshag pa dang /
280a3('bum): brdung zhing btso ba dang / bsreg pa la sogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don du spro zhing skyo ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
280a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bla ma rnams
280a5('bum): la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
280a6('bum): chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan med par pha
280a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su 'tshol ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing 'tshol ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
280b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'am/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi
280b2('bum): khams su gang ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes mi ngoms pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa'o/ /
280b3('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/ chos
280b4('bum): kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu'ang re ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems
280b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
280b6('bum): par byed cing / bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi zhing yongs su spyod ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi
280b7('bum): zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa
281a1('bum): gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar brten na/ sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur
281a2('bum): ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar ston cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
281a3('bum): chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta
281a4('bum): ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o/ /de la byang chub
281a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
281a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi btang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
281a7('bum): dpa' chen po byang chub la yang 'dod pa mi bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
281b1('bum): chog shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub
281b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi mi gtong ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos zab mo rnams la mi rtog par gzhog pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
281b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi gtong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba gang zhe na/ bslab
281b4('bum): pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod
281b5('bum): pa'i yon tan la smad pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i sems mi bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems
281b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
281b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba gang zhe na/ phyi
282a1('bum): nang gi chos thams cad 'dzin pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba'o/ /de la byang
282a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa la de'i sems mi gnas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
282a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad
282a4('bum): yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
282a5('bum): po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te skye ba dang / skra bregs shing ngur smrig gi gos
282a6('bum): bgo ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong
282a7('bum): ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du'ang lhan cig mi gnas shing / de'i rgyus yongs su sgom pa'i sems mi bskyed cing /
282b1('bum): de'i rgyus gos 'thob par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
282b2('bum): dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ gang bdag gis
282b3('bum): sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag sems can 'di dag rang rang gis bsod nams kyis bde bar gyur na/ de la bdag gis ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi
282b4('bum): bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
282b5('bum): 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am/
282b6('bum): de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste/ 'di
282b7('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar
283a1('bum): bya ba yin zhe na/ gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / 'thab mo'i sems sam/ rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa ste/ 'di
283a2('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/
283a3('bum): phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
283a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol gyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
283a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/
283a6('bum): de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la'ang bar du gcod na/ /'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la smos kyang mi dgos kyi/ spang bar
283a7('bum): bya'o zhes spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
283b1('bum): dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na gang gis nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa lta ci
283b2('bum): smos zhes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
283b3('bum): chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang
283b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya
283b5('bum): ba yin zhe na/ dngos por mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
283b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yid gnyis spong bar bya zhe na/ gang gi phyir chos thams cad yid gnyis dang bral bar mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
283b7('bum): po'i yid gnyis yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin
284a1('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
284a2('bum): chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba'o/ /de las drug la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug
284a3('bum): ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
284a4('bum): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
284a5('bum): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i gang chen mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ /phyin to/ /phyin par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang /
284a6('bum): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / mi brjod pa dang / 'dus ma byas te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la
284a7('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su
284b1('bum): spang bar bya ba'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ sred pa'i sems yongs
284b2('bum): su spang bar bya ba'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ slong mo pa mthong na sems zhum pa mi bskyed do/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ dngos po thams cad yongs
284b3('bum): su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ kha za yag gi sems su mi bya'i sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba
284b4('bum): ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe
284b5('bum): na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can du 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /srog tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srog
284b6('bum): shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /gang zag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang zag shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin
284b7('bum): par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag
285a1('bum): par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba med pa de la rtag pa dang / chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
285a2('bum): dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
285a3('bum): rgyur lta bar mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la
285a4('bum): mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po
285a5('bum): la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phung po shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na phung po la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
285a6('bum): dpa' chen pos khams la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar khams rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji
285a7('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ skye mched la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na skye mched
285b1('bum): la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin
285b2('bum): med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
285b3('bum): chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
285b4('bum): khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med
285b5('bum): pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la brten par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum
285b6('bum): la gnas par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams gsum la gnas par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar
285b7('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas/ sangs rgyas
286a1('bum): mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi
286a2('bum): bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas/ chos
286a3('bum): mthong bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub
286a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la brten pas/ dge 'dun mthong
286a5('bum): bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub
286a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas/ tshul khrims rnam
286a7('bum): par dag par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang
286b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad steng pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong
286b2('bum): pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid la zhum par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid
286b3('bum): dang 'gal bar mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa bas/ stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
286b4('bum): pos stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
286b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma med pa
286b6('bum): mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa med pa shes pa yin zhe na/
286b7('bum): de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems mi 'jug pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge
287a1('bum): ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing
287a2('bum): snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad la
287a3('bum): brnyas par mi bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba gang
287a4('bum): yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bsnan pa dang bri ba med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang yin zhe na/
287a5('bum): chos thams cad tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang rtogs pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba la bzod pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad skye ba
287a6('bum): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la bzod pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa gang yin zhe na/ ming dang
287a7('bum): gzugs mi skye ba shes pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad
287b1('bum): tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang yin zhe na/ gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /de la
287b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bsal ba gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
287b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par spong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon
287b4('bum): mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas
287b5('bum): dang lhag mthong gi sa gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang yin
287b6('bum): zhe na/ khams gsum la dga' bar sems pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/ dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /
287b7('bum): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa med pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
288a1('bum): chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug gi btang snyoms so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i
288a2('bum): zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag tu lus ston pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang
288a3('bum): zhe na/ sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas
288a4('bum): rnam par brtse ba gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par brtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro 'ang / de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du
288a5('bum): shes su mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas
288a6('bum): kyi zhing mthong yang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du
288a7('bum): yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
288b1('bum): khams yongs su gtong zhing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan
288b2('bum): gdags pa'i don du chos la bsnyen bkur ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku yang dag
288b3('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas shing / sems can thams
288b4('bum): cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems
288b5('bum): can thams cad kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas/ byang chub sems
288b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad byed pa ste/ de'i sems chos gang la'ang mi 'jug pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par bzhag
288b7('bum): pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams
289a1('bum): kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams
289a2('bum): ji lta ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de ltar de ltar ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin to/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched du bsams shing srid
289a3('bum): pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar
289a4('bum): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar
289a5('bum): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
289a6('bum): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang
289a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig
289b1('bum): pas khong du chud pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
289b2('bum): tshe rabs thams cad du brdzus shing skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
289b3('bum): dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen por skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289b4('bum): po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal
289b5('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
289b6('bum): dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi rigs su sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su
289b7('bum): skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe
290a1('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub tu sems can rnams bkod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di
290a2('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems
290a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ de dag rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
290a4('bum): chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
290a5('bum): po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu mngon par 'byung zhing sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
290a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang
290a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba yin/ lhun bai DUR+Yar 'dug pa yin/ yal ga rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin las grub pa yin/ me
290b1('bum): tog dang / lo ma rin po che thams cad las gyur pa yin/ shing de'i dri zhim po dang / 'od bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par gang ba yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems
290b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum
290b3('bum): tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
290b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa de bzhin
290b5('bum): gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
290b6('bum): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
290b7('bum): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor/
291a1('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de la byang chub sems
291a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul
291a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
291a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
291a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das
291a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams
291a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong
291b1('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
291b2('bum): rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
291b3('bum): pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
291b4('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
291b5('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
291b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
291b7('bum): bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ rigs kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'/ brgyad pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ mthong
292a1('bum): ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ bsrabs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ byas pa rtogs pa'i
292a2('bum): sa las yang dag par 'da'/ nyan thos kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'da' ste/ rab 'byor/
292a3('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sa dgu las yongs su 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas te/ rab 'byor/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
292a4('bum): po'i sa bcu'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol
292a5('bum): tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po re drug pa/ /rab 'byor/ khyod kyi sa gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis khams
292a6('bum): gsum nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa
292a7('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di
292b1('bum): ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos ni 'byung ba'am/ 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ byung bar gyur pa med de/ rab 'byor/
292b2('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de
292b3('bum): bzhin nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan
292b4('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gtan gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de
292b5('bum): ni nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad
292b6('bum): do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rab tu byung ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
292b7('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'gog pa'i dbyings
293a1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad

293a5('bum): 'byor/ gang gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
293a6('bum): ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /'du shes stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med

293b1('bum): 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'du
293b2('bum): shes 'du shes kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'du byed 'du byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i

296b2('bum): pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro//
296b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
296b4('bum): gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
296b5('bum): 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /
296b6('bum): rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid
296b7('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams
297a1('bum): 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mig gi 'dus
297a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
297a3('bum): stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
297a4('bum): nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam
297a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
297a6('bum): du gnas pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /
297a7('bum): rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
297b1('bum): gyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lce'i 'dus te
297b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong pa'i

297b4('bum): ni/ rmi lam 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sgyu ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med

297b7('bum): 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rmi lam ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
298a1('bum): nyid du gnas pa med do/ sgyu ma ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /smig rgyu ni khams

298a4('bum): ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rmi lam ni rmi lam gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /sgyu ma ni sgyu mas stong pa'i phyir

298a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /

298b1('bum): rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
298b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab

298b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni

302b5('bum): yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /

303a7('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad
