303b2('bum): med do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
303b3('bum): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /
303b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /
303b5('bum): smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden
303b6('bum): pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir
303b7('bum): ro/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
304a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mthar
304a2('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong
304a3('bum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid
304a4('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan
304a5('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/
304a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams
304a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /gzungs kyi
304b1('bum): sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi
304b2('bum): ngo bo nyid ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
304b3('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
304b4('bum): bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan
304b5('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de
304b6('bum): ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba
304b7('bum): med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
305a1('bum): pa med do/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
305a2('bum): med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/
305a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni
305a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
305a5('bum): ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung par 'dod pa de ni/ dgra
305a6('bum): bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/
305a7('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid mad pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
305b1('bum): 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams
305b2('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
305b3('bum): pa med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
305b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo
305b5('bum): bo nyid ni/ dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni/
305b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid
305b7('bum): med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/
306a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ phyir mi
306a2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/
306a3('bum): gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang byang chub 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni

306a6('bum): do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams
306a7('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
306b1('bum): nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rang byang chub ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni khams gsum
306b2('bum): nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
306b3('bum): nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lan cig phyir
306b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo
306b5('bum): nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis
306b6('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/
306b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ ming 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab
307a1('bum): 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
307a2('bum): chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ brda 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tha snyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad
307a3('bum): do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ ming stong pa nyid ni khams
307a4('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
307a5('bum): pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /brda stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams
307a6('bum): gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /gdags pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad
307a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming stong pa nyid ming stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan
307b1('bum): ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /brda stong pa nyid brda stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tha snyad stong pa nyid tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong
307b2('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ /gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ skye ba

307b4('bum): nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar
307b5('bum): 'dod pa de ni/ /rnam par byang ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor/ gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'byung

307b7('bum): pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum

308a3('bum): pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa ni/ skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gag pa med pa ni 'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i
308a4('bum): phyir ro/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong
308a5('bum): pa'i phyir ro/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar rnam grangs 'dis na/ 'di ltar theg pa chen
308a6('bum): po ni khams gsum nas byung nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes par bya ste/ gnas pa de ni bskyod du med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang khyod kyis
308a7('bum): gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/ theg pa chen po de gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad
308b1('bum): ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir mi gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar theg pa chen po de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas
308b2('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de
308b3('bum): bzhin nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di

308b5('bum): ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po
308b6('bum): de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de bzhin nyid kyi
308b7('bum): ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni
309a1('bum): gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin nyid
309a2('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab
309a3('bum): pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de

309a6('bum): dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
309a7('bum): lta ste/ dper na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/
309b1('bum): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gog pa'i dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang
309b2('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi
309b3('bum): ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la
309b4('bum): ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'gog pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i dbyings
309b5('bum): nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab tu byang ba'i dbyings
309b6('bum): rab tu byang ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gog pa'i
309b7('bum): dbyings 'gog pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po re bdun pa/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
310a1('bum): lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas
310a2('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshor ba stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/

310a4('bum): pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'du byed stong pa nyid ni gnas
310a5('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
310a6('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma
310a7('bum): yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'du shes kyi
310b1('bum): ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med
310b2('bum): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tshor ba tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'du shes 'du shes kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'du
310b3('bum): byed 'du byed kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mig stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas
310b4('bum): pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rna ba stong pa nyid ni gnas
310b5('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
310b6('bum): sna stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/

311a4('bum): la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /sna'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /lce'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /lus kyi ngo bo nyid la

317b1('bum): pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
317b2('bum): dper na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /
317b3('bum): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas
317b4('bum): pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas
317b5('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de
317b6('bum): bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang
317b7('bum): ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma
318a1('bum): yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
318a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab
318a3('bum): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi
318a4('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang
318a5('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/

318a7('bum): ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
318b1('bum): ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ nang
318b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am
318b3('bum): mi gnas pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /don dam
318b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni

318b6('bum): gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la na gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa
318b7('bum): med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /mi dmigs
319a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /ngo bo
319a2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
319a3('bum): rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis
319a4('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid
319a5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis
319a6('bum): stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
319a7('bum): pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa la phyir
319b1('bum): ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mi dmigs pa
319b2('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
319b3('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
319b4('bum): rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
319b5('bum): dper na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin
319b6('bum): no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/

320a2('bum): 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/

320a4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ de ci'i
320a5('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa
320a6('bum): med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /stobs rnams kyi
320a7('bum): ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
320b1('bum): ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /yang dag par
320b2('bum): spong ba rnams yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dbang po rnams dbang po rnams
320b3('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir re/ /stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'phags pa'i lam

320b5('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bsam gtan rnams
320b6('bum): ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/
320b7('bum): tshad med pa rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
321a1('bum): lta ste/ dper na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen
321a2('bum): po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/

321a6('bum): pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas

321b1('bum): ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta
321b2('bum): ste/ dper na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang

321b4('bum): mi gnas pa med do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'ang mi

321b6('bum): pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la
321b7('bum): ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med

322a2('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i
322a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
322a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa/ rnam par thar pa'i
322a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams
322a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
322a7('bum): bcu ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/
322b1('bum): dper na/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab
322b2('bum): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/
322b3('bum): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ snying rje chen po ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas
322b4('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab

322b6('bum): mi gnas pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med
322b7('bum): do/ /snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i

323b5('bum): bo nyid byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
323b6('bum): na/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma

324a1('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang

324a6('bum): pa med do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /rang byang chub kyi
324a7('bum): ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid
324b1('bum): kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo
324b2('bum): nyid phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid
324b3('bum): rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/
324b4('bum): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/
324b5('bum): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
324b6('bum): pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
324b7('bum): de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam pa thams cad
325a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ ming ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/
325a2('bum): de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mtshan ma ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /
325a3('bum): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brda ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma
325a4('bum): yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tha snyad ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi
325a5('bum): gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gdags pa ni gnas
325a6('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ ming gi
325a7('bum): ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ /mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am ma gnas pa med do/ /brda'i ngo bo nyon la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ /tha snyad
325b1('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ /gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa 'am mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar ming gi ngo bo nyid
325b2('bum): ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /brda'i ngo bo nyid brda'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tha snyad kyi ngo bo nyid
325b3('bum): tha snyad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma
325b4('bum): yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'gag pa med
325b5('bum): pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
325b6('bum): na/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni/ gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin
325b7('bum): no/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rnam par byang ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/
326a1('bum): mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid
326a2('bum): la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa med do/ /rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am
326a3('bum): mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gag pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid 'gag pa med
326a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid
326a5('bum): rnam par byang ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /rab
326a6('bum): 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni gnas pa'am
326a7('bum): mi gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro// //
326b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po re brgyad pa/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ theg pa de ni mi gnas par gnas pa'i tshul dang / bskyod du med pa'i tshul
326b2('bum): gyis gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa des su zhig 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni theg pa des su'ang 'byung bar 'gyur
326b3('bum): ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar theg pa de gang yin pa dang / gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang nas 'byung bar
326b4('bum): 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis 'byung bar 'gyur/ de ci'i
326b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / srog shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / 'gro ba shin tu rnam par
326b6('bum): dag pa dang / gso ba shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gang zag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shed can shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shed
326b7('bum): bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / byed pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / tshor ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / mthong
327a1('bum): @#/ ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pas bdag dmigs su med do/ /sems can dmigs su med do/ /srog dmigs
327a2('bum): su med do/ /'gro ba dmigs su med do/ /gso ba dmigs su med do/ /skyes bu dmigs su med do/ /gang zag dmigs su med do/ /shed can dmigs su med
327a3('bum): do/ /shed bdag dmigs su med do/ /byed pa po dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba po dmigs su med do/ /shes pa po dmigs su med do/ /mthong ba po dmigs su
327a4('bum): med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par
327a5('bum): dag pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par
327a6('bum): dag pa'i phyir phung po rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir khams rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir skye mched rnams
327a7('bum): dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs
327b1('bum): su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med
327b2('bum): do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med
327b3('bum): do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par
327b4('bum): dag pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
327b5('bum): dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu
327b6('bum): rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
327b7('bum): phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag
328a1('bum): pa'i phyir dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /

328a4('bum): dag pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag
328a5('bum): pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
328a6('bum): phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dbang po rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs rnams
328a7('bum): dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
328b1('bum): brgyad pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gtan rnams dmigs
328b2('bum): su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshad med pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs
328b3('bum): su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
328b4('bum): dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam
328b5('bum): par dag pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzungs
328b6('bum): kyi sgo rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mi 'jigs pa rnams
328b7('bum): dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dmigs su med do/ /
329a1('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs
329a2('bum): pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba dmigs su med do//
329a3('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
329a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmigs su med
329a5('bum): do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do/ /
329a6('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag
329a7('bum): pa'i phyir rang byang chub dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam pa

329b2('bum): med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam par byang ba med pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam
329b3('bum): par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'
329b4('bum): dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir da ltar byung ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba dmigs su med do/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i

329b7('bum): mi dmigs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa yin zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings dmigs
330a1('bum): su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pas de bzhin nyid dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir

330a5('bum): pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /phung po dang khams dang skye mched mi dmigs pas phung po dang khams dang skye mched dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
330a6('bum): 'byor/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs pas/ rten cing
330a7('bum): 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin no/ /
330b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni dmigs

331a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa ni dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi

331b6('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs

346b7('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
347a1('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
347a2('bum): po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
347a3('bum): thams cad de/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng+ge rnam par rtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
347a4('bum): zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug
347a5('bum): rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
347a6('bum): cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par
347a7('bum): bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dwags la yang dag par
347b1('bum): 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyams pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
347b2('bum): yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung
347b3('bum): rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel zhi'i ting nge 'dzin
347b4('bum): dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'tshol ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems
347b5('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
347b6('bum): dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
347b7('bum): mi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
348a1('bum): nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin
348a2('bum): dang / snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa'i ting
348a3('bum): nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
348a4('bum): thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
348a5('bum): thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge
348a6('bum): 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
348a7('bum): rab rib med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams
348b1('bum): cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
348b2('bum): yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs
348b3('bum): su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam
348b4('bum): pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i
348b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su
348b6('bum): sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmigs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la
348b7('bum): mngon par dga' ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi glo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang
349a1('bum): dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun pa dang 'gal
349a2('bum): ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / glog
349a3('bum): gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med
349a4('bum): cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad
349a5('bum): nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med
349a6('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid kyi skyon
349a7('bum): yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
349b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa
349b2('bum): nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
349b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang
349b4('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ 'di ni byang chub sems
349b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
349b6('bum): bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
349b7('bum): brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
350a1('bum): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa
350a2('bum): rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
350a3('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gang
350a4('bum): yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
350a5('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ rab 'byor/ gal te 'dod pa'i khams de
350a6('bum): bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can
350a7('bum): gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ 'dod pa'i
350b1('bum): khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen
350b2('bum): po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te gzugs kyi khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan
350b3('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen
350b4('bum): po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed
350b5('bum): pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
350b6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te gzugs med pa'i khams de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin
350b7('bum): la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du
351a1('bum): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i khams de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed
351a2('bum): pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
351a3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te gzugs de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden
351a4('bum): pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
351a5('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la
351a6('bum): ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin
351a7('bum): no| |rab 'byor/ gal te tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la
351b1('bum): ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi
351b2('bum): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos
351b3('bum): po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te 'du shes de bzhin/ ma nor
351b4('bum): ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig
351b5('bum): yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ 'du shes de rnam par brtags
351b6('bum): pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang mi dang
351b7('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te 'du byed de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma
352a1('bum): yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po
352a2('bum): 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ 'du byed de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa yongs

352a4('bum): zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag
352a5('bum): pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
352a6('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ rnam par shes pa de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther
352a7('bum): zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/
352b1('bum): gal te mig de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur

352b6('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ rna ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su
352b7('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig

353a7('bum): rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ lce de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma
353b1('bum): yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/

353b3('bum): ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ lus
353b4('bum): de rnam bar brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen
353b5('bum): po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te yid de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de

353b7('bum): kyang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ yid de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su
354a1('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang
354a2('bum): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te gzugs de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci
354a3('bum): log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi
354a4('bum): dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ gzugs de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa
354a5('bum): ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
354a6('bum): gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te sgra de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta
354a7('bum): ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil
354b1('bum): gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ sgra de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur
354b2('bum): ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir/ theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal
354b3('bum): te dri de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos
354b4('bum): can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ dri de rnam par
354b5('bum): brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha
354b6('bum): dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te ro de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log
354b7('bum): ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
355a1('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cir 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ ro de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su
355a2('bum): bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
355a3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te reg de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden
355a4('bum): pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brten la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin
355a5('bum): du bcas pa'i 'jigs rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ reg de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag
355a6('bum): cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
355a7('bum): mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te chos de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba
355b1('bum): bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan

355b3('bum): te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te mig gi rnam par
355b4('bum): shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos

355b7('bum): chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te rnam ba'i rnam par shes pa de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan
356a1('bum): ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos
356a2('bum): po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ rna ba'i

356a4('bum): de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa de

359a3('bum): tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos

359a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can
359a6('bum): te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te rna ba'i
359a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan
359b1('bum): la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan cing 'byung
359b2('bum): bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther
359b3('bum): zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po 'dis lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te 'byung ba yin no/ /rab
359b4('bum): 'byor/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta

360a1('bum): ba yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci
360a2('bum): log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos can gyi dngos po zhig yin na ni/ theg pa chen po 'dis kyang lha dang

360b1('bum): de rnam par brtags pa/ rnam par bskyed pa/ yongs su bsgrubs pa ste/ mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin 'gyur ba'i chos can te/ dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa

360b3('bum): bzhin/ ma nor ba de bzhin/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin te/ phyin ci log ma yin la bden pa yang dag pa ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtag cing brtan la ther zug mi 'gyur ba'i chos
