437a3('bum): gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba
437a4('bum): med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /chos
437a5('bum): kyi mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
437a6('bum): gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/
437a7('bum): gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /chos kyi
437b1('bum): dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du 'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang
437b2('bum): 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'od ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i
437b3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang
437b4('bum): nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas
437b5('bum): par 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha'
437b6('bum): ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
437b7('bum): gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur
438a1('bum): ba med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /yang dag pa'i
438a2('bum): mtha'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gang nas kyang
438a3('bum): 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba
438a4('bum): med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/
438a5('bum): gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /
438a6('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub ni gang nas
438a7('bum): kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro
438b1('bum): ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /byang chub kyi
438b2('bum): ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar
438b3('bum): yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
438b4('bum): 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
438b5('bum): gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /
438b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang
438b7('bum): du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas
439a1('bum): par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus
439a2('bum): byas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang
439a3('bum): 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de
439a4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin
439a5('bum): nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/
439a6('bum): gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/
439a7('bum): de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro ba'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med do/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs
439b1('bum): so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs so/ /dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/ theg pa chen po zhes bya'o zhes smras pa ni de de bzhin no/ /
439b2('bum): de de bzhin te/ theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/
439b3('bum): de'i phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong ngo / /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis
439b4('bum): stong ngo / /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong ngo / /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /theg pa chen po'ang theg pa chen pos
439b5('bum): stong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ste/ rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba med do/ /gnyis zhes bya ba med do/ /gsum zhes bya ba med do/ /bzhi
439b6('bum): zhes bya ba med do/ /lnga zhes bya ba med do/ /drug ces bya ba med do/ /bdun zhes bya ba med do/ /brgyad ces bya ba med do/ /dgu zhes bya ba med do/ /bcu zhes bya ba med do/ /tha dad ces
439b7('bum): bya ba med do/ /de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste/ de la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /de la 'dod chags
440a1('bum): dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /gti mug dang / gti mug med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /
440a2('bum): ming dang / ming med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyang mi dmigs so/ /dge ba dang / mi dge ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /kha na ma tho ba yod pa dang / kha na ma
440a3('bum): tho ba med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /
440a4('bum): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /skye ba dang / 'gag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /
440a5('bum): de la rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /bdag dang bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'ang mi
440a6('bum): dmigs so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par
440a7('bum): 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das
440b1('bum): pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
440b2('bum): stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta
440b3('bum): ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i tshor ba ni 'das pa'i tshor bas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis
440b4('bum): stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i 'du shes ni 'das pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i
440b5('bum): phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmigs par
440b6('bum): 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i 'du byed ni 'das pa'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid
440b7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmigs par 'gyur ba la ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das
441a1('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis
441a2('bum): stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba la ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs
441a3('bum): kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs
441a4('bum): pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i tshor bas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
441a5('bum): tshor ba dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i chor ba dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab
441a6('bum): 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis
441a7('bum): stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed kyis
441b1('bum): stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du
441b2('bum): byed dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
441b3('bum): rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/
441b4('bum): rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong
441b5('bum): pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba ni da ltar byung ba'i
441b6('bum): tshor bas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da
441b7('bum): ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da
442a1('bum): ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmigs
442a2('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo / /ji ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmigs
442a3('bum): su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byur ba'i 'du byed dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ da ltar
442a4('bum): byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang
442a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
442a6('bum): ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
442a7('bum): pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/
442b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma
442b2('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
442b3('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum
442b4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa
442b5('bum): nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs
442b6('bum): pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ bzod
442b7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi mi'i mthar mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
443a1('bum): dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa
443a2('bum): nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
443a3('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus
443a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam
443a5('bum): pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung
443a6('bum): ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa
443a7('bum): lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
443b1('bum): tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
443b2('bum): dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus
443b3('bum): kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
443b4('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
443b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa
443b6('bum): nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid
443b7('bum): la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/
444a1('bum): rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ nang stong
444a2('bum): pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs ba'i dus mi dmigs/
444a3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma
444a4('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid ni
444a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam
444a6('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid
444a7('bum): la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig
444b1('bum): smos/ rab 'byor/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni
444b2('bum): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa
444b3('bum): nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
444b4('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i
444b5('bum): mthar mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam
444b6('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
444b7('bum): nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig
445a1('bum): smos/ rab 'byor/ chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/
445a2('bum): chen po stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus
445a3('bum): mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
445a4('bum): smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ don
445a5('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/
445a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi
445a7('bum): dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
445b1('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni phyi mi'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'dus byas stong
445b2('bum): pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyi zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/
445b3('bum): mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das
445b4('bum): pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni
445b5('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum
445b6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la
445b7('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs
446a1('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mtha'
446a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam
446a3('bum): pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar
446a4('bum): byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa
446a5('bum): lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung pa'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
446a6('bum): pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
446a7('bum): dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung pa'i dus
446b1('bum): kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da
446b2('bum): ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dor ba
446b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi
446b4('bum): dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa

446b6('bum): nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam
446b7('bum): pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung

447a2('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni

447a6('bum): ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

447b6('bum): pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar
447b7('bum): mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam
448a1('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa
448a2('bum): nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs
448a3('bum): pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi

448a5('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs

448a7('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dngos po med
448b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
448b2('bum): dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
448b3('bum): smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
448b4('bum): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa
448b5('bum): nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i

448b7('bum): smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
449a1('bum): dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i
449a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam
449a3('bum): pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs
449a4('bum): pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni da ltar
449a5('bum): byung bar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam
449a6('bum): pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i

449b1('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de
449b2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs
449b3('bum): te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
449b4('bum): dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/
449b5('bum): stobs rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/
449b6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs
449b7('bum): pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi
450a1('bum): yan lag rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dus gsum
450a2('bum): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid
450a3('bum): la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
450a4('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam
450a5('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum
450a6('bum): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid
450a7('bum): la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
450b1('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden
450b2('bum): pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs
450b3('bum): te| de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs
450b4('bum): te| mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung
450b5('bum): ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams
450b6('bum): ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam
450b7('bum): pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
451a1('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ tshad med pa rnams
451a2('bum): ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
451a3('bum): la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung
451a4('bum): ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci
451a5('bum): zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
451a6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
451a7('bum): ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/
451b1('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs
451b2('bum): pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni phyi
451b3('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir de na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam
451b4('bum): pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi
451b5('bum): dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs ba lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab
451b6('bum): 'byor/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis
451b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
452a1('bum): na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi
452a2('bum): dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
452a3('bum): da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
452a4('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
452a5('bum): pa med pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i
452a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs
452a7('bum): te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar
452b1('bum): byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mngon par
452b2('bum): shes pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i
452b3('bum): dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/
452b4('bum): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ ting
452b5('bum): nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dus
452b6('bum): gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam
452b7('bum): pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i
453a1('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
453a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de
453a3('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs
453a4('bum): te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar
453a5('bum): byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mthar
453a6('bum): mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i
453a7('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs
453b1('bum): te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i
453b2('bum): dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi mi'i mthar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni da ltar
453b3('bum): byung bar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa
453b4('bum): nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
453b5('bum): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon
453b6('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa
453b7('bum): bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam
454a1('bum): pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
454a2('bum): smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ byams pa chen po ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byams pa
454a3('bum): chen po ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byams pa chen po ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ byams pa chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
454a4('bum): 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa
454a5('bum): nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs
454a6('bum): pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ snying rje chen po ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ snying rje chen po ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ snying rje chen po ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ snying
454a7('bum): rje chen po ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi
454b1('bum): dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma
454b2('bum): 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
454b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
454b4('bum): brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/
454b5('bum): mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus byang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i
454b6('bum): dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta'ang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi
454b7('bum): dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
455a1('bum): gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni dus gsum
455a2('bum): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni
455a3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su
455a4('bum): med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni
455a5('bum): da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
455a6('bum): yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin
455a7('bum): gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
455b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang
455b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang / mi dang / lha
455b3('bum): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
455b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di/ legs par gsungs
455b5('bum): pa ni legs shing dge ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
455b6('bum): nyid thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad
455b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
456a1('bum): po rnams mchis kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du dus gsum
456a2('bum): mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o/ /de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
456a3('bum): ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
456a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to/ /brnyes so/ brnyes par 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu
456a5('bum): gcig pa'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po don bzhi pa/ /de nas byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
456a6('bum): ldan 'das/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko
456a7('bum): ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
456b1('bum): ldan 'das/ bdag gam/ gcig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
456b2('bum): 'byor/ de ltar gyur ba'ang med do/ rab 'byor/ khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar dge
456b3('bum): ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha
456b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du
456b5('bum): 'dus shing khongs su chud pa/ de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan
456b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
456b7('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
457a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang /
457a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
457a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
457a4('bum): dang | don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
457a5('bum): dang | dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
457a6('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
457a7('bum): pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
457b1('bum): dang | mngon par shes pa dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang / rgyas pa'i skye mched dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba
457b2('bum): dang | 'gog pa dang / lam dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de
457b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms
457b4('bum): chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi
457b5('bum): phyogs gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos
457b6('bum): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /rab 'byor/ de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
457b7('bum): dang | brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
458a1('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa
458a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te
458a3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna
458a4('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa
458a5('bum): dang | sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang
458a6('bum): yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus
458a7('bum): te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
458b1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang / me'i khams gang yin
458b2('bum): pa dang / rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang /
458b3('bum): rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang /
458b4('bum): len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin

464b1('bum): ba'ang / bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'ang / byang chub sems dpa' la mngon

464b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams su mchis sam/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/ yongs su mi 'jum/
465a1('bum): 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing yid mi 'jigs mi dngang / skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
465a2('bum): pa la spyod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

465a7('bum): ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes
465b1('bum): bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta
465b2('bum): bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du
465b3('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
465b4('bum): zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis
465b5('bum): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par
465b6('bum): bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas so zhes smra/ tshe
465b7('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi'ang / bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
466a1('bum): dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
466a2('bum): la/ gzugs mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ tshor ba mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ 'du shes mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ 'du byed
466a3('bum): mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis te/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /gang mngon
466a4('bum): par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags so/ /gang mngon par

466a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems

466b3('bum): pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i
