480a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
480a2('bum): ti'i bu/ de ltar na chos med pa gang yin pa dang / chos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
480a3('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe
480a4('bum): dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
480a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes
480a6('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//
480a7('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
480b1('bum): mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
480b2('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
480b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
480b4('bum): ti'i bu/ mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la
480b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid
480b6('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
480b7('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes
481a1('bum): pa med pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam
481a2('bum): par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin
481a3('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
481a4('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
481a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes
481a6('bum): pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna
481a7('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
481b1('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
481b2('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
481b3('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes
481b4('bum): pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med
481b5('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan
481b6('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
481b7('bum): radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin
482a1('bum): pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
482a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
482a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dben
482a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par
482a5('bum): shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /
482a6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
482a7('bum): mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
482b1('bum): su mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
482b2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben
482b3('bum): pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/
482b4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang
482b5('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de
482b6('bum): ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa
482b7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
483a1('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
483a2('bum): so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
483a3('bum): mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
483a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
483a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
483a6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
483a7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
483b1('bum): ti'i bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi
483b2('bum): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam
483b3('bum): par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
483b4('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par
483b5('bum): shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
483b6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi
483b7('bum): rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
484a1('bum): so| |lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
484a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong
484a3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi
484a4('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
484a5('bum): dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
484a6('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/
484a7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon
484b1('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin
484b2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
484b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lus
484b4('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
484b5('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
484b6('bum): shA radwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
484b7('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
485a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi
485a2('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
485a3('bum): dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
485a4('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
485a5('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu
485a6('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
485a7('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
485b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
485b2('bum): ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam
485b3('bum): par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
485b4('bum): dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
485b5('bum): shA radwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
485b6('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
485b7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
486a1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi
486a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
486a3('bum): so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
486a4('bum): su mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ mig
486a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
486a6('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
486a7('bum): ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
486b1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang
486b2('bum): yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
486b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
486b4('bum): med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
486b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
486b6('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i
486b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
487a1('bum): so| |rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
487a2('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang
487a3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
487a4('bum): pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa
487a5('bum): la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid
487a6('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
487a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med
487b1('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
487b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
487b3('bum): do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
487b4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
487b5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
487b6('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
487b7('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
488a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid
488a2('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang /
488a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa med
488a4('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma
488a5('bum): yin| byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
488a6('bum): ti'i bu/ de ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben ba gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo
488a7('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
488b1('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa
488b2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med
488b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi
488b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid
488b5('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa
488b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa
488b7('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa
489a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
489a2('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/
489a3('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ /
489a4('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
489a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa
489a6('bum): dang | phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
489a7('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus
489b1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
489b2('bum): so| |lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
489b3('bum): dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
489b4('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
489b5('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
489b6('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi
489b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te
490a1('bum): reg pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus
490a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
490a3('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
490a4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
490a5('bum): pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
490a6('bum): pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi
490a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
490b1('bum): dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
490b2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
490b3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
490b4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
490b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid dang / yid
490b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
490b7('bum): med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang
491a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
491a2('bum): yin no/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben
491a3('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
491a4('bum): pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang
491a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ mig
491a6('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
491a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus
491b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
491b2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus
491b3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
491b4('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
491b5('bum): ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa
491b6('bum): dang | mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid
491b7('bum): med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te
492a1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mig gi 'dus
492a2('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma
492a3('bum): yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
492a4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid
492a5('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
492a6('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
492a7('bum): dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
492b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
492b2('bum): dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi
492b3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i
492b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub
492b5('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
492b6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
492b7('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
493a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi
493a2('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
493a3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo
493a4('bum): nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan
493a5('bum): ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa
493a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa
493a7('bum): dang | byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de
493b1('bum): gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i
493b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
493b3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg
493b4('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
493b5('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
493b6('bum): tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
493b7('bum): so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub
494a1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
494a2('bum): so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / sna'i
494a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus
494a4('bum): mi dmigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus
494a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
494a6('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sna'i 'dus te
494a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben
494b1('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
494b2('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang
494b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te
494b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
494b5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
494b6('bum): gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
494b7('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
495a1('bum): gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
495a2('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo
495a3('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang /
495a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi
495a5('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
495a6('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang
495a7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe
495b1('bum): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lce'i
495b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
495b3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lus
495b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
495b5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg
495b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
495b7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
496a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med
496a2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi
496a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub
496a4('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
496a5('bum): na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
496a6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs
496a7('bum): te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
496b1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
496b2('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
496b3('bum): tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang /
496b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
496b5('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i
496b6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
496b7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
497a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
497a2('bum): dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
497a3('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
497a4('bum): dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid
497a5('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi
497a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te
497a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
497b1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa'ang
497b2('bum): gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
497b3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
497b4('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
497b5('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
497b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
497b7('bum): med do/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po don drug pa/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
498a1('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams dben pa'i
498a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams med pa'i phyir
498a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir
498a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams med pa'i phyir
498a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang
498a6('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
498a7('bum): shA radwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams med pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / sa'i khams dben pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
498b1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sa'i khams med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma
498b2('bum): yin| sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
498b3('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa
498b4('bum): dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
498b5('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
498b6('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chu'i
498b7('bum): khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams
499a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
499a2('bum): so/ /chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /
499a3('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /chu'i
499a4('bum): khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams med pa dang / chu'i khams
499a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chu'i khams dben pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chu'i khams med
499a6('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
499a7('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/
499b1('bum): de ltar na chu'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa
499b2('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar
499b3('bum): med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
499b4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
499b5('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
499b6('bum): mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
499b7('bum): dmigs so/ /me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /me'i
500a1('bum): khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
500a2('bum): dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ me'i khams med pa dang / me'i khams stong pa nyid dang / me'i khams dben pa dang / me'i khams ngo bo nyid
500a3('bum): med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ me'i khams med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
500a4('bum): ma yin/ me'i khams dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
500a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na me'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / me'i
500a6('bum): khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / me'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
500a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i
500b1('bum): bu| rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rlung
500b2('bum): gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rlung
500b3('bum): gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rlung
500b4('bum): gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rlung
500b5('bum): gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi
500b6('bum): khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir
500b7('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams med pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi

508a6('bum): ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i
508a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang
508b1('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
508b2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
508b3('bum): so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid med

508b5('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ tshor ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor
508b6('bum): ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
508b7('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa
509a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'

509a5('bum): dmigs so/ /sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /

514b7('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bzod
515a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang
515a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i
515a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
515a4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
515a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha
515a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
515a7('bum): so| / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i
515b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi
515b2('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang
515b3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
515b4('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
515b5('bum): pa med pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid
515b6('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
515b7('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /brtson
516a1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i
516a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
516a3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
516a4('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
516a5('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
516a6('bum): so| |brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
516a7('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
516b1('bum): radwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
516b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/
516b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med
516b4('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan
516b5('bum): pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
516b6('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
516b7('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i
517a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
517a2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid
517a3('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /
517a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
517a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
517a6('bum): tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
517a7('bum): so| |bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
517b1('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
517b2('bum): tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
517b3('bum): mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
517b4('bum): ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
517b5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam
517b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang /
517b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dang gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin la dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin
518a1('bum): pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
518a2('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
518a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
518a4('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
518a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /
518a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
518a7('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
518b1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
518b2('bum): na| tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang /
518b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'ang gzhan
518b4('bum): ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med
518b5('bum): pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan pa yin no/ /
518b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
518b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin
519a1('bum): pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// //shes rab kyi pha
519a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po don bdun pa/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
519a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
519a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
519a5('bum): so| |nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
519a6('bum): so| |nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
519a7('bum): so| |nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /
519b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa
519b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ nang stong pa
519b3('bum): nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang
519b4('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
519b5('bum): ltar na nang stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
519b6('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de
519b7('bum): gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
520a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong
520a2('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong
520a3('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong
520a4('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong
520a5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong
520a6('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi stong pa
520a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ phyi stong
520b1('bum): pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang
520b2('bum): chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
520b3('bum): ltar na phyi stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
520b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med
520b5('bum): do| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
520b6('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
520b7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
521a1('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
521a2('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong
521a3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo
521a4('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
521a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
521a6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
521a7('bum): med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
521b1('bum): yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang
521b2('bum): yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
521b3('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
521b4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
521b5('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang
521b6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
521b7('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ma dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /
522a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
522a2('bum): su mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
522a3('bum): su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa
522a4('bum): dang | stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma
522a5('bum): yin| stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma
522a6('bum): yin| byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
522a7('bum): ti'i bu/ de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong
522b1('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
522b2('bum): cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ chen po stong
522b3('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong
522b4('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong
522b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chen po stong

529a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin
529a7('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
529b1('bum): mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
529b2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir

529b4('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
529b5('bum): dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
529b6('bum): med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa
529b7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
530a1('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de
