530a3('bum): nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
530a4('bum): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos thams
530a5('bum): cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
530a6('bum): so| |chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
530a7('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ma dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben

536b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben
536b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
536b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo
536b4('bum): bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
536b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
536b6('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dran pa nye
536b7('bum): bar bzhag pa med pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo
537a1('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
537a2('bum): yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
537a3('bum): dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
537a4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir
537a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong
537a6('bum): ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /
537a7('bum): yang dag par spong ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
537b1('bum): so| |yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
537b2('bum): dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa
537b3('bum): dang | yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ yang dag par spong ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/
537b4('bum): yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
537b5('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar
537b6('bum): na yang dag par spong ba med pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba ngo bo
537b7('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams

538a3('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med

538a5('bum): gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi

543b5('bum): dmigs so/ /bsam gtan med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /
543b6('bum): bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
543b7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan med pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan dben pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
544a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ bsam gtan med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam
544a2('bum): gtan dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
544a3('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gtan med pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
544a4('bum): bsam gtan dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi
544a5('bum): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang
544a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang
544a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
544b1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
544b2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
544b3('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
544b4('bum): so| |tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ tshad med pa med pa dang / tshad med
544b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / tshad med pa dben pa dang / tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ tshad med pa med pa'ang
544b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshad med pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan pa yin/ byang chub sems
544b7('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshad
545a1('bum): med pa med pa gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
545a2('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su
545a3('bum): byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i
545a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems

550b1('bum): yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems

550b3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
550b4('bum): dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
550b5('bum): dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
550b6('bum): dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
550b7('bum): dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /
551a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
551a2('bum): mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo
551a3('bum): nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ ting nge 'dzin med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyang
551a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
551a5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin med pa gang yin pa dang /
551a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
551a7('bum): dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
551b1('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
551b2('bum): dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
551b3('bum): dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
551b4('bum): dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
551b5('bum): dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
551b6('bum): dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
551b7('bum): dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo
552a1('bum): nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/
552a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
552a3('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na gzungs kyi
552a4('bum): sgo med pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang
552a5('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad gang gnyis su med de gnyis su
552a6('bum): byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
552a7('bum): pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
552b1('bum): mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'i phyir byang
552b2('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
552b3('bum): pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
552b4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi
552b5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
552b6('bum): pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa
552b7('bum): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi
553a1('bum): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs
553a2('bum): pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma
553a3('bum): yin| byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
553a4('bum): radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
553a5('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /
553a6('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ mi 'jigs pa med pa'i
553a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa dben
553b1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa med
553b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa dben
553b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa med
553b4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa dpen pa'i phyir
553b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
553b6('bum): ti'i bu/ mi 'jigs pa med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa dben pa dang / mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
553b7('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ mi 'jigs pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa ngo bo
554a1('bum): nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
554a2('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mi 'jigs pa med pa gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa
554a3('bum): dben pa gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
554a4('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
554a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa
554a6('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /so
554a7('bum): so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
554b1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
554b2('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa stong
554b3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag
554b4('bum): par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa med pa dang /
554b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
554b6('bum): mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa
554b7('bum): dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
555a1('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa med pa gang yin
555a2('bum): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang
555a3('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med
555a4('bum): de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi
555a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa'i
555a6('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi
555a7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med
555b1('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir
555b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
555b3('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po med pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dben pa
555b4('bum): dang | snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ snying rje chen po med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje
555b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
555b6('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na snying rje chen po med pa
555b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po dben pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
556a1('bum): gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis
556a2('bum): su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
556a3('bum): 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
556a4('bum): dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir
556a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas
556a6('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
556a7('bum): mthar mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi
556b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
556b2('bum): 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa dang /
556b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/
556b4('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
556b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
556b6('bum): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa
556b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
557a1('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang /
557a2('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
557a3('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
557a4('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
557a5('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
557a6('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
557a7('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
557b1('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings
557b2('bum): med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus
557b3('bum): mi dmigs te/ chos kyi dbyings med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings ngo bo
557b4('bum): nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
557b5('bum): no| |tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chos kyi dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang /
557b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin
557b7('bum): pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
558a1('bum): dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
558a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
558a3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
558a4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
558a5('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
558a6('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de
558a7('bum): bzhin nyid med pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa dang / de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
558b1('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ de bzhin nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ngo bo nyid
558b2('bum): med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /
558b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid
558b4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
558b5('bum): kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang
558b6('bum): dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
558b7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
559a1('bum): dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'i phyir
559a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i
559a3('bum): mtha' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i
559a4('bum): mtha' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir
559a5('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo
559a6('bum): nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa
559a7('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
559b1('bum): yin| sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa
559b2('bum): gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
559b3('bum): sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang
559b4('bum): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa
559b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis
559b6('bum): mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
559b7('bum): mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub
560a1('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /
560a2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
560a3('bum): su mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
560a4('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
560a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
560a6('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
560a7('bum): dbyings dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
560b1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa gang yin
560b2('bum): pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo
560b3('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
560b4('bum): su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nyan thos/ med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa
560b5('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos ngo bo nyid med
560b6('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir
560b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
561a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos stong
561a2('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ma dmigs so/ /nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i
561a3('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ nyan thos med pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dben pa
561a4('bum): dang | nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ nyan thos med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos stong pa nyid
561a5('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos de ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
561a6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nyan thos med pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos
561a7('bum): stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang
561b1('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang rang sangs

562a7('bum): med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems
562b1('bum): dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//
562b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
562b3('bum): mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
562b4('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir byang chub

562b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
562b7('bum): ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid
563a1('bum): med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub

563a6('bum): gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
563a7('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i
563b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen
563b2('bum): pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen
563b3('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /thams cad
563b4('bum): mkhyen pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen
563b5('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems/ dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir
563b6('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan par shA radwa ti'i bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa med pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med
563b7('bum): pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thams
564a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
564a2('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan par shA radwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na thams cad mkhyen
564a3('bum): pa med pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid med
564a4('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
564a5('bum): cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des ni byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub
